11.title: better head off to school

choices: Art class with Miss Mason.
English class with Miss Robin.
Gym or Science.
111.content:
The smartest choice that you could think of was sneaking into the kindergarten for some clothes. You knew it was a risky decision, as there were about a hundred things that could go wrong. Some little girl could find you and mistake you for a doll, or a school employee could find you a mistake you for a small child. Still, you were a teenage girl, and there was no way you were going to school naked.

So, acting out real life almost like it was a scene from a spy movie, you crept along the side of the kindergarten building. You searched until you found an open window, which thankfully led to an empty classroom. You scaled the wall and flipped into the room, immediately going to work to try and find some clothes to wear.

It didn't take long, as luck seemed to be shining down upon you today. You found some simple doll clothes that fit you, a plain tan shirt and tan pants. There were no shoes, or underwear for that matter, but you figured you would survive for one day. With that done, you escaped out of the kindergarten the way you came in, and sprinted all of the way to your high school.

You walked into the front doors with a few precious minutes to spare before classes began. You ran as fast as you could until you stopped suddenly in the hallway. For some reason, your mind had completely blanked on what class you had first today. The incidents you had experienced had jumbled your brain. What class did you have again?

Was it Art with Miss Mason? Your art class was usually pretty fun, and Miss Mason was probably the nicest teacher in the entire school. She was an attractive blonde who made it her mission to make sure you enjoyed your class each day. She wasn't the most observant woman though, leading to many incidents involving the art supplies and the other students, even Miss Mason herself on occasion.

Did you have English class with Miss Robin? English class was exactly like any other English class in the world. A boring forty minute torture fest, occasionally interrupted by a fun little activity. You rarely read any good books. Miss Robin was alright, and fairly good looking, but she wasn't anything special. Most kids hated the class, and some mean girls tried to amuse themselves with you in various ways sometimes.

Maybe you had gym class first thing today. Gym was lead by Miss Woodcrest, who was definitely the strictest woman in probably the entire world. If she caught you slacking off, not giving one hundred percent, or even glancing at her curved, toned body, you had a million push-ups in your future. She never took it easy on you, nor did the girls in the class. She had a habit of punishing you if she thought you were slacking.

The last option was science class with Miss Sarah. Miss Sarah was the busty woman at your school, and none of her outfits came close to holding her jiggly flesh. Every person in the school, both male and female, found themselves staring at her body. She was also the most oblivious teacher at the school, and never seemed to be aware of your existence, even though you had been in her classes for two whole years. Mean students would often add you to the experiments for the day, and unaware Miss Sarah would torment you for forty minutes, sometimes longer if the situation was dire.

You pondered about this for a few minutes, coming to the conclusions that your classes really sucked. At the very least, Kat and Ana were in all of those classes with you, so they would be able to protect you, to some extent. Kat and Ana were the cause of a lot of torment to you themselves. Finally, you remembered what class you had first today. Which is it?
111.title: Another "Normal" School Day

1111.content:
You smacked your forehead. Of course you had art class today. How could you be so stupid? You took a sigh of relief, always glad to be around Miss Mason. She could unknowingly harm you from time to time due to her rather oblivious nature, but she meant well. You raced off to her classroom, knowing you only had a few minutes to get there. At least the halls were empty, meaning no incidents could occur on your way there.

You rushed into the classroom, just as Miss Mason was closing the door to her room. She didn't notice you enter the room, and even crushed you under her heel as she walked back to her desk. You snuck under all of the students on your sprint to your desk, which was positioned all of the way in the back of the room. You scaled the desk and stood waiting on top of it, smiling warmly at your teacher. It appeared that not a single person had seen you enter the room.

“Alright class! Today I have a special little project for you.” Miss Mason's angelic voice rang out. “I'm sure all of you creative geniuses will love this one. On your desk is a big glob of gummy material. Everyone familiar with gummy material?” The class nodded.

You looked in front of you, and sure enough there was a huge pile of gummy material sitting there. The giant glob was actually bigger than you were. You didn't know how you hadn't noticed it before. The clump of gummy was a seamless tan shade, not too far off from your own tan body color. You couldn't help but shudder slightly.

Glancing back up, you noticed that Kat and Ana weren't anywhere to be seen. This was odd, as they usually had a pretty good attendance record. You wondered where they might be, but Miss Mason continued before you could put more thought into it.

“So class, the project that I want you to work on today is quite simple.” Miss Mason grinned. “Make whatever you want. Take this silly little gummy blob and turn it into whatever your precious little heart desires. You could make a statue, or a vase, or even some gummy clothing for those of you more crafty people. And if anyone is concerned about the properties of gummy...” Miss Mason ducked behind her desk, and lifted a large plastic tub onto her desk.

“...I have this!” Miss Mason beamed, and you felt your blood run cold. The side of the plastic tub read “Beta4”. “This is a huge tub of a liquid substance called Beta4. It reacts uniquely with gummy material, and instantly hardens the gummy into whatever form you put it into. It will stay that way forever, until it comes into contact with some special solvent. I don't have any though, so you'll need to find your own. The solvent is hard to come by.”

You couldn't believe what you were hearing. Your art teacher had a tub full of the most dangerous chemical in the world, and not a single drop of the solvent needed to defeat it? If anything bad happened during this class, it could easily mean the end of your life.

“Also, I have one more thing to share before we begin. After you finish your creation and dunk it into the Beta4, I'm allowing you to take it home. You can keep it forever, and do whatever you want with it!” The entire class cheered, but you had heard enough. You needed to get out of this class, and fast. You walked forward and were just about to raise your voice to speak when disaster struck.

A girl had walked to the back of the class to sharpen her pencil. For some reason, she had taken a full stack of five textbooks with her. On her way back to her seat, she tripped on someone's bookbag and spilled her text books. The heavy books came slamming down onto you, instantly squashing you and the gummy material blob flat. The girl quickly picked up her books, but the damage was done. You and the glob were both flat as pancakes.

The girl wasn't finished though. Seeing what she had done, she set her books aside and attempted being helpful. She grabbed you in one hand, not recognizing you, and the glob in the other, and shoved both together. Your gummy body and the gummy glob collided, and you immediately felt yourself adhering to the sticky substance. The girl molded you and the glob several times, until it once more resembled a perfect glob of gummy material. She then walked back to her seat.

This was terrible. Your body was now partially absorbed into this big blob of gummy material, making any possible reformation impossible without outside help. To make matters worse, the tan clothing you had picked out at the kindergarten blended in perfectly with the tan gummy material. The only parts of you that were visible were your hands, feet, and face, but they only differed but a slight shade. You were essentially invisible.

A minute later, you overheard several voices talking at the front of the room. It seemed that two girls had arrived late, and eagerly wanted to get started on the project.

“It looks like Jill's table is open. She must not have shown up today.” You heard Miss Mason say, sealing your fate. “You girls can go there. Or the table beside hers. That one is also empty.” Two pairs of footsteps walked closer and closer to where you were trapped, and you heard feminine giggles. Do the girls sit at your table, and if so, who are they?

As the twins walked to the bus, dresses tucked under their arms, they chatted happily, blissfully unaware that their new dresses were comprised of their poor, defenseless classmate. They had absolutely no idea, and there was nothing you could do to tell them. There was nothing anybody could do.

The girls got home, and they each entered their respective bed rooms. Morgan hung her dress up in the closet, while Bella laid her dress out on her bed. She was intending to wear it that night to a fancy party at her friend’s house. Thankfully, the party didn’t start for a few hours, and Bella left her room after setting you down.

Even though you knew it was futile, you still tried to wiggle and squirm. To your total surprise, your body actually responded. You realized with more happiness than you had ever felt in your entire life that the Beta4 you had been soaked in was a faulty batch! Over the next thirty minutes, the Beta4 completely lost its hold of you, and your gummy body reformed.

Though your body had been split in two, your consciousness was fully contained in Bella’s dress. As such, only that part of your body could reform, so by the time your gummy self had grown back to normal, you were only six inches tall. The dye was also long-lasting, and would take many baths to get out, so your body was still a mesmerizing mix of red and yellow.

You sighed deeply, but you were determined to take fate into your own hands. You would go find your other half, which was probably sitting in a pile at the bottom of Morgan’s closet, merge with it, and reform back to your normal, foot-tall self. You had let fate cruelly push you around for too long. This time would be different.

Just then, you heard footsteps approaching, so you dropped to the floor and crawled under Bella’s bed. No sooner had you disappeared from sight did Bella swing open her door and step inside. Not a second passed before you heard Bella gasp loudly, noticing that her new dress was nowhere to be found.

Bella said something in Indian, and then you heard her drop to the floor. Panicking, you rolled out from under her bed, and hid yourself under a pair of discarded, slightly smelly leggings. Your quick thinking managed to avoid Bella’s gaze as she checked under her bed for her missing dress.

Bella was not so easily deterred, and she began scanning her room, desperate to find where her dress had suddenly disappeared to. As she approached her leggings, you clung to them. Bella lifted them up into the air to check underneath, and you went up into the air, and unnoticed by Bella. However, your plan hit a flaw as Bella sighed and tossed the leggings over her shoulder.

You flew through the air and landed on a thumb tack that had been used to hang up one of Bella’s various posters, and had fallen to the floor. The thumb tack poked you right in the stomach, causing you to cry out in brief pain. Bella stopped her search, and her head began to turn towards your direction.

Freaking out, you glanced to your left and saw that Bella’s bedroom door was still open. If you made a mad dash for it, you could still make it. Jumping to your feet, you dashed towards the open door, towards freedom. As soon as you made it out into the hallway, you could go to Morgan’s room, get the rest of your gummy mass back, escape this house, and find your way home.

When she tripped, her skirt flipped up briefly. It was only for a moment, but it was just enough time for your flattened body to slip right off of her panties. You floated to the ground, falling right in the middle of the big stack of dropped papers. You were face down on the ground when you landed.

Dana cursed her stupidity, and then quickly scooped up her papers. Unfortunately, in her haste, she didn’t even notice you in the midst of the pile. You were sorted right in with the rest of the papers, organized right in the middle of the stack. The papers on top of you kept you flat and unable to reform. Today just was not your day.

Dana carried the stack of papers to her desk and set them down. She plopped into her seat with exhaustion, but she knew she couldn’t afford to slack off. She had to work through her massive stack of papers in only a few short hours, and it was going to be tough. Millie was a nice person, but she could be firm if she needed to be. She wouldn’t be too pleased if Dana didn’t finish all the papers that day.

Dana clicked her pen on, and began to fill out paper after paper. The process was slow and boring, both for you and Dana. Dana hated filling out paperwork, as it wasn’t interesting in the slightest. On the other hand, you were crushed under a stack of papers and unable to do anything but sit and wait.

Two hours passed by, and Dana filled out the paper resting on top of you. She hadn’t noticed you yet, but you were on the top of the pile now, free for the world to see. You knew that you would now be able to reform and get back to your normal schedule. You were sick of misadventures for one day.

Dana finished the paper she was on, and she reached for you. She hesitated in picking you up, seeing that you clearly were not a normal piece of paper. She could not see your face, as you were still face down, so all she could see was your backside. She wondered why anybody would need a piece of paper that was tan, blonde, and blue, the colors making up your skin, hair, and clothing.

Unfortunately for you, despite your odd coloring, you still looked and felt like a piece of paper. Your body had been stretched into a small rectangle underneath the stack of papers, so Dana simply shook her head in confusion.

Dana remembered that Millie liked being colorful and often used colored paper for some of her paperwork. Dana smiled at the eccentricity of her employer, and then picked up her pen.

You felt the sudden sharp pen of her pen jabbing into your back, and you realized with horror that she still thought you were a piece of paper. You tried to squirm to get her attention, but it was worthless.

Dana didn’t see any blanks to fill in, so she simply wrote down a message for her boss on the paper. She didn’t know what else to write. She wrote “I really like this new paper Millie”.

As Dana’s pen scratched into your back, you mentally screamed out in pain. Invisible tears formed in your eyes as you howled in agony. You didn’t think you had ever felt something so painful before. Dana was obliviously torturing the living daylights out of you, and she had no idea that you weren’t a simple colored piece of paper. Her pen scraped out her message in your back, and finally she finished.

Dana put her pen down, and marveled at how the tan color turned red as she wrote. The thought that she was tearing into someone’s skin never crossed her mind. She picked you up when she was done, and folded you in half. She bent your flat back in half, revealing your face to her and covering up the message on your back. However, she still didn’t notice your face.

She walked into Millie’s office, noticing that her boss was not currently in. She quickly sneaked in, dropped you on her desk, and then snuck out. You were left in the dark office, silently sobbing to yourself.

An hour later, the office door swung open and the lights were flicked on. Who is it that enters the office?

123321.content:
Laying there folded up like a letter for an hour, you wondered why your luck was always so bad. You were a nice person, you helped people, you didn't build up any bad karma. Yet here you were, always suffering, it wasn't fair. Your thoughts were cut short as suddenly the light clicked on, blinding you for a moment. A slowly focusing blur of a figure walked infront of you. A blurry hand came into focus as it reached for you, with finely manicured nails attached to some elegant fingers. As the figure lifted you up, her face came into focus as your flat little eyes finally adjusted to the burst of light you experienced after an hour of darkness. Your heart stopped, if you could have moved or made a sound, dogs in the street would have whined at the high pitched "OHMYGODITSMILLIEMARIGOLDOHMYGODOHMYGODOHMYGOD!" thankfully for the dogs and your own personal embarrisment, as a paper like letter form you couldn't make a sound or a fool of yourself.

Unfortunatly, while your eyes could move, your shock had frozen them staring at her, so Millie didn't notice anything weird when she looked at what looked like a girls face of a soft piece of paper. As she would do with a normal letter, she simply opened up the folded part, turning your face away from her and read the short little note from her secutary. She chuckled softly "New paper huh. I guess it is pretty funky" she said turning you back over. You could feel her fingers feeling over your soft smooth surface, totally unaware she was stroking over a girl who was squished right now. She stared right into your eyes, but missed your blink as she once more turned you over. Sitting behind her desk she put you down, face down on the desk and you felt a liquid being rubbed on your back where the writing was. the chemical tingled but was also soothing to your poor skin. Unknown to you, Millie Marygold had just used an ink wash to wipe away the pen ink so she could reuse you, thinking you were a nice bit of paper for her to write her notes down.

She lifted you slightly as she moved a clipboard out under you, you saw it had clips on all four sides to make sure the paper remained totally steady and taut. you really didnt want that pinching down on you holding you in shape. you desperatly tried to peel open your flattened mouth to make some sort of noise before you ended up as a celebrity note pad for the forseeable future...

124.content:
the girl smirked giggling and poking you, watching your useless struggles in her arms. "heh you say your a person, but i bet a little kid wouldnt agree. your about the size of a large doll" she teased. you glared and kicked your legs uselessly "i told you i am NOT a doll. now put me down or else!" you said angrilly but the girl just smirked "or else what?" she asked calling your bluff. your struggles slowed and you stammered "or ...or else...um or else..." the girl giggled "uh huh thought so." she glanced around and then grinned seeing a little girl sitting there with her mother on the phone, she had a doll about the same size as you on her lap and was playing with it.

"lets put it to the test shall we little doll lady" she teased getting up, holding you firmly. she walked over to the girl, her mother obliviously continuing her conversation on the phone "hey there, thats a cute little dolly you have there" she said sweetly. the little girl blushed but smiled "thank you, her name is annabelle." she said shyly. the girl grinned "you like dolls huh. would you like to have my dolly? im a bit too big for them now" she said holding you up, the little girls eyes widen as she watched you struggle "oh wow your dolly moves" "im not a doll!" "yeah she talks to. but shes a bit grumpy. maybe if you play with her you will cheer her up" she said passing you over to the eager child.

you were passed over like an object but your struggles fared no better in the little girls hands than it did of your previous captor "little girl, look im not a d.mmmmph" you tried to start but the little girl shoved a large dolly pacifier into your mouth, it was larger than your lips, designed for a doll to be popped in and not fall out, you tried to raise your hands to pull it out but the little girl shifted you about and cradled you like a baby doll "your mine now little dolly. im going to call you Charlotte!" you cooed happily. the girl from before laughing and walking back to her seat.

Dispite your struggles, soon you and the dolly Annabelle had swapped outfits to the little girls delight, the poofy bow and ribbon covered dress now covering you, the little stockings and plastic shoes, as well as a big pink ribbon bow in you hair. Annabelle looked like a casual little woman right now next to your adorableness. you kicked and struggled but the little girl stopped you every time. with the pacifier in your mouth you couldnt make much sound and you saw your stop coming up. you had to get free now or this little girl was going to take you home...

1243.content:
Seeing the bus slowing down for your stop you stopped struggling, the little girl instinctively relaxing her grip on you for a moment and that was all you needed. Quickly pushing off from her you were off her lap and out of her grip before she could react. You heard her cry out "No Charlotte come back!" But you were already gone, your little plastic shoes clicking on the floor of the bus as its doors opened and...you tripped on one of the dress ribbons.

Tumbling down the steps out of the bus you bounced off the curb and rolled back into the road under the bus. You heard the hiss of the door as it shut above you and in a frantic panic you tried to scramble out from under the bus, but your many dolly petticoats made a quick escape on your knees impossible.

You managed to get your fingertips and the damn pacifier out of the buses path before the entire weight of it rolled over you, you grunted out a panicked scream as you were smoothed deep into the thick treads of the tyre, the intense weight of the machine pressing you in like a piston. Your world, what blurry little you could see, spun round and round, over and over you were crushed under the tyre as the bus continued its route.

After a few more stops you heard the muffled crying of the girl who thought you were a doll telling her mommy they had to go back for her Charlotte dolly, you would gladly leap back in her arms than stay under tyre but you had no say in the matter as the bus drove off once more.

As the bus drove on, all sorts of gunk and junk from the road squished into you, you could almost taste it as it compressed into your gummy skin. The dress you had been wearing was long gone, worn away and torn by all the friction, you wish you had gone with it.

That was your entire day, living it up in the tyre tread, traveling all over, seeing the sights from the unique vantage point of the wheel of a bus. You hated every second. Finally the bus pulled into the depot and they began cleaning it, scraping all the crud (and you) out of the tyre treads, your body was like a tar like gum right now, no chance of reforming as you were bagged up with the rest of the trash and chucked in a dumpster.

The feeling and weight of other bags being thrown in ontop of yours put to rest and thought of reforming and you began to fear you'd be buried alive at the city dump. You tried to struggle in your gummy glob of a form all night but there was just too much weight ontop of you. Eventually, despite the terrible smell inside the bag you fell asleep.

Come morning you were awoken to the loud beeping of something reversing and your world shook with a loud clang. The dumpster was being emptied! You hadn't reformed at all during the night and soon felt your bag tumbling through the air, rolling as it landed in a mass of compressed bin bags. You heard the rumbling hiss of the compactor unit starting its process and felt your already tight world compress even more, crushing more of this crud into you.

Finally the compressions stopped and the truck moved on, you along with it. Over and over you were compressed until finally the truck was full and it went to the dump.

It emptied its load onto a huge automated conveyor and your bag slid onto the belt along with hundreds of other bags, but as luck would have it, through the compressions your bag had split. You tumbled out of the bag lying ontop of the sea of garbage as it moved along the conveyor, ever so slowly your heavily punished body began reforming. It was reset as it got to a rolling pin machine crushing the junk flat, you along with it. Thankfully you reformed enough to drag yourself off the belt just before your area of bags went through the huge garbage shredder. You tumbled down with a splat and lay there until you reformed.

Finally human shape again you tried to cheer, only to feel that dumb pacifier bulb still in your mouth silencing you. You reached to pull it out and discovered only the bulb remained, without a handle you couldn't pull the large bulb out, leaving you mute. It was then you noticed your body.

It was tar black, from top to toe, you looked like you were made of tar, you even had a slight sheen to your body. This would take a long bath and scrubbing in industrial solvents to get off, fused into your gummy body. Only your eyes showed any contrast to your body. You also stank. Rummaging around you found a half used bottle of fabric detergent and scrubbed it all over you, it didn't wash off the colour but at least you smelt like clothes now instead of garbage. You used a torn bin bag as a makeshift dress and with a heavy sigh began to make your way out of the city dump towards home on the other side of town...

1243212.content:
Approaching the door, you could hear commotion behind it. A distinctly familiar deep voice was talking, and you decided to investigate further. Climbing atop a nearby crate and pushing small box of gummy out of the way, you could kinda see what was happening inside the office through the window next to the door. Your uncle Gary, which you never saw very often, was standing over a pile of clothes, his back turned to the window. There was something tan in his hands and he was slowly squishing it into a sphere. Glad to see a familiar face, you banged on the window with your fist, trying to get his attention, the pane of glass smushing your hands with each strike. You managed a low tapping sound, and he heard it. His body turned, and you could clearly see the cause of commotion. In his hands was an orbs of sorts, but there was an outline of a face, dad's face. You had heard stories of what Gary did to him when they were younger, but you figured that the stories were fake, and to keep you from doing anything stupid. A story your father told you about was a time he was poured into your mother's lip gloss by Gary when they were teens, and ultimately turned into a bra for his mother when she mistakes him for an orb.

Gary grabbed a plastic bag off your father's desk and stuffed him into it, sealing it. Tossing the clothes into the garbage can next to the desk, he stood up, and began walking towards the door. Shaking your head no, you realized that you needed to run and hide, or you were going to share the same fate as your father in that bag. You hopped down off the crate, which was a big mistake. Your landing spot was right in front of the door, and your feet squished as you landed, trapping you in one place.

The door flew open, and as if it was a game of improvised baseball, launched you off the catwalk and into the vast machinery below. Gary looked around outside of the door, wondering who had knocked on the window, not even noticing what happened. Shrugging, he carried Jack down towards the assembly line. You on the other hand, landed on a conveyor belt just past the loading area. The impact caused you to be squished, and as you rolled, your body became an orbed shape. The conveyer belt carried you through various machines, one of which removed all the gravel and dirt in your body. A second machine on the line submerged you in a bath of soapy water, washing whatever funky smell you had picked up from the tires.

Finally, the belt carried you to a sorter, which would send orbs to different parts if the line to be crafted into specific types of clothing. The whole factory was completely automated, except for maintenance and shipping. As you passed through one of the many dividers, Gary approached your line, swapping the orb in front of you for your father, which he grabbed from the bag and set in its place. Chucking the spare orb over his shoulder, he leaned down and whispered something to him. It was along the lines of “It's about time you were put where you belong. I'll make sure you get sent to a local store. Maybe Mary will buy you, for old times’ sake. Or maybe I'll see you on a passing jogger. Goodbye squishy.” Gary said, typing something into the nearby computer.

A pair of claws lifted him, twisting his body in various ways. The claws then began folding and stretching him into the shape of a pair of skin-tight female exercising shorts. When they finished, the outline of his face had been pushed to the back of the shorts, before it was covered in a black spray from a sprayer, hiding all human features. The machine set him back down onto the belt, and picked you up. The arms pulled at your body, stretching you this way and that. Your legs were stretched into one continuous strap, and each of your arms were stretched over to connect to them, creating the shoulder and back strap. Your face was separated into the center of two cups, your eyes in the left one, and your mouth in the other. The machine has molded you into a sports bra! Gasping in horror, a dark purple spray began covering you, cementing you in place, your mouth agape, and your eyes wide open. The spray must be mixed with Beta 4! The grape taste of the spray filled your mouth, before absorbing completely into you, keeping your mouth open. The spray covered your eyes, cementing you in place, hiding all human features, but somehow allowing you to still see. It would literally be impossible for anybody to distinguish you from the the others coming from the line.

The machine set you down onto a pile of similar bras, the front of the bra facing down, allowing you to see out. Next to you was a pile of form-fitting exercise shorts, with your formed father at the top of them. If only you could show him you were in the same boat as him, and if he got rescued, come to your aid as well. But, not even he knew you were here. You're body was now flexible as a standard sports bra, but damn near unbreakable and you would never wear out, retaining that soft feeling of new clothing. That's why people love gummy clothing; they last forever. The next and final step of the production line had you most concerned, packaging.

Gary walked over to the table where you both were sitting, and opened a shipping cardboard box. He smirked as he lifted your father's stack and set them in, and then as he set yours next to it, closing the flaps of the box, sealing you inside. In the darkness, you heard him slap a upping label on it, and loaded it onto a truck. About 2 hours later after constant bumps and turns, the box was removed from he truck, and a few minutes later, set down somewhere. The box opened up to reveal a rather attractive, fit looking woman in a Trak Sports store uniform. She began hooking your fathers pile with hangers, setting them on the rack with your father being the last put on the rack, leaving him the first to be grabbed. Finished putting the skin-tight running shorts on the rack, she moved on to your pile. Hooking the hangars in each one, she lifted your pile and set them on the rack, you being the first in row as well, with the front sticking out. With your face shoved into the bra behind you, you couldn't see a thing. It must have been opening time, because as soon as the girl left, a hand began flipping through the bras, obviously looking for their size. A hand grabbed you and pulled you out, and the first thing you noticed was your father in the hands of Stacy, being forced into the crotch of the woman to compare the fit. Looking up past your future owner’s breasts, you could see that it was…
1243212.title: You get knocked into the assembly line

choices: You are forced to endure the entire five-mile run as your mother's sports bra.
To your utter amazement, your straps snap halfway through the run.
12432122.content:
“Well, this is definitely a really cute sports bra.” Your new owner said, in an incredibly attractive and alluring voice. You recognized who was holding you almost immediately, and your fears were confirmed upon seeing their face. It was none other than the beautiful bombshell Mary, your very own mother!

“Yeah, and it looks to be just your size.” Stacy, standing beside her, pointed out. “That’s pretty lucky to find a bra to fit your huge knockers.”

“Knockers?” Mary cried in false anger. “Jack loves my big boobs. They look sexy, he said. Besides, your breasts are pretty much the same exact size.”

“True.” Stacy thrust out her chest proudly. “Emma plays with these boys ALL the time.”

“Too much info Stacy.” Mary laughed, giving her friend a playful hip check. Mary placed you down into a shopping bag she had by her feet. From your vantage point, you could see her pull one of the exercise shorts off of the rack. “These shorts form a really nice pair with the bra.” Mary nodded, dropping the shorts into her bag. They fell down on top of you, covering you up and blocking your vision. Thankfully, you could still hear.

“Yeah, I’m totally going to buy this pair.” Stacy proclaimed, placing the shorts that were your father into her own bag. “But, I’ve got a really cute pink sports bra at home that Emma custom ordered for me, so I won’t need to buy anything else. Ready to check out?”

“Sure thing.” Your mother and Stacy headed over to the cash register, and handed their purchases to the same curvy employee from earlier. She scanned the barcode that had been slapped onto your packaging, ringing up your cost as she handed you back to your mother. You mentally smiled in a sort of depressed way. You had just been sold to your own mother as nothing but clothing for her to wear as she saw fit. It was as if, legally, you were nothing but her slave.

You shook these thoughts out of your head as you heard Mary and Stacy part ways in the parking lot, each getting into their own cars to head back home. No one in the world except for you knew that your father was helplessly trapped as those exercise shorts in Stacy’s bag. You were the only person who could save him from being worn by your mother’s best friend for the rest of his life.

Of course, then you had the crushing realization that there really was no one in the world who knew that you were this sports bra. Even the person who was responsible for transforming your dad didn’t know of your fate. How could you save your father from his horrible situation, if you were enduring the blissfully unaware torment of your mother? You didn’t know how to do it, but first you needed to save yourself. Somehow.

Mary got home and immediately sent you and the exercise shorts she had bought through the wash. Despite your best, and most naïve, hopes, the Beta4 did not wash out by the end. You were still trapped as a sports bra, tailored to your mother’s size with all of your facial features hidden. You couldn’t help but stifle a tiny mental sob as your mother picked you up, remarked about how cute you were, and tossed you into a basket full of clothes.

She brought the basket upstairs, and slipped you into her underwear drawer. You spent the rest of the day in total darkness. By the time light shone into your prison once more, it was the next day, at 6:00 in the morning. Looking a little groggy, your mother peered down into the drawer and took you out.

You were thrown off for a moment as you took in your mother in all of her radiant, naked beauty. She was truly the most gorgeous woman on the planet, you had no doubt. It was clear to see why your father had married her. Of course, he had also married her because of how she would do anything to protect him and care for him. Unfortunately, those kind acts were only when she was aware of his presence. Applying the same rules to you right now, you were in serious danger.

Mary slipped you on unceremoniously, as she paced around her room and stretched. Her massive breasts crushed you painfully, but your form held. Her jiggly flesh slapped against your body, and her nipples poked painfully into your eyes and your mouth, respectively. Still, you supported and comforted Mary wonderfully, just as she hoped her new sports bra would do.

After slipping on a thong and her new exercise shorts, Mary rushed downstairs, gobbled down a granola bar, and skipped outside. Stacy and Emma, dressed in an equally revealing exercise outfits, were already waiting for her. The three women did a few warm-up stretches for about fifteen minutes. Even the slightest movement from Mary caused you intense aching and pain. It was like constantly being beaten to a pulp by twin elephants.

“Alright Mary. I’m thinking we can run five miles today. Sound good?” Stacy suggested, the thought causing you to mentally shiver in horror.

“Yeah, I should be able to manage.” Mary nodded. “The marathon is twenty miles, and it’s in three weeks, right? Five miles seems like a good start.”

“Alright then. Ready when you are.” Emma smiled.

You glanced up, and saw that it was none other than Kara, your eternal nemesis, who was walking towards you. She was dressed in a tight blouse and mini skirt, and was busy typing away on her phone. She hadn’t seen you, so you thought about running for it. Realizing that if the giant, sadistic girl caught you your life would essentially be forfeit, you instead played possum. You let yourself fall limp to the ground like any other gummy doll.

Sadly, your plan didn’t go like you had wanted. Kara kept walking until her sneakered left foot rose up and slammed down on your chest, squashing it flat. Letting out a small gasp, Kara glanced down at you in confusion. She stepped off of you and lifted you up, peeling your squashed chest off of the ground. As she held you in her hands, she poked and prodded at your body.

She thought that maybe you were Jill, which of course you were, but you were able to hold yourself deathly still. To double-check, Kara took a big sniff, trying to see if she could pick up on your body’s natural strawberry cheesecake scent. However, the process of being molded into a gummy doll back in the factory had left you smelling like roses instead. Eventually, Kara was convinced you were just a normal gummy doll.

“How did you get out here little one?” Kara cooed, in a sweet and naïve way. You had never seen Kara this happy and…normal. “Let’s take you back inside and get you fixed up.” Kara grinned, and tucked you under her arm, continuing to walk back towards the factory. Your eyes went wide, but you didn’t dare move now. You had committed to this plan, and you had to face the consequences.

As Kara walked, she stroked at your hair, twisting strands into cute little spirals. You almost had trouble believing that the girl currently carrying you was Kara. Kara had always been an unsympathetic, sadistic…well…bitch. But now, it was impossible to see anything but innocence and charm radiating from her. If this was how Kara truly was, why was she only a terrible monster to you?

Kara walked in and checked in at the front desk, sliding an application form over to the secretary. The secretary grabbed the form and input the information into her computer. You grimaced as this was going on. If Kara secured a position at your dad’s factory, she would have an endless supply of gummy material, color dyes, and Beta4, plus millions of new ways to ruin your life. Sadly, you knew it would be a cinch for Kara to secure a position.

“Hey, I’m going to go run this gummy doll over to the make-up girls really quick.” Kara informed the secretary. “I found it lying outside, and it hurts to see it dirty. I’d like this gummy doll to get back out into the hands of a little girl somewhere!”

“That’s wonderful! You’re such a sweet girl. I love the initiative.” The secretary grinned. “You can head up to Mister Harper’s office when you’re done. I don’t think you’ll have trouble getting a nice job here with an attitude like yours.”

“You really think so? Thanks ma’am!” To your utter amazement, Kara actually giggled as she turned away from the desk and strolled down the hallway. Your amazement quickly turned to fear as you saw the full scope of your future play out before you.

If Kara dropped you off at the make-up department, you would be cleaned up, dunked in Beta4, and shipped off to some random store just waiting to be bought. On the other hand, trying to escape now would alert Kara to your existence, and she would have free reign to do whatever she wanted with you. As Kara drew closer to her destination, you knew you had to make a choice.

Patty easily squashed you down into a black, shiny mound of flesh. She pondered for a moment about what to turn you into, but then a devilish smile crept across her face. She smirked down at you as you stared helplessly up at her.

You had no idea why Patty was ever so mean to you. Maybe she was jealous of the extra attention you received, or maybe she thought you enjoyed her little pranks. You mentally shuddered at the thought that maybe your sister actually was a sadist, and that she gained pleasure from torturing you, but you pushed those thoughts aside. Patty was probably just a mean sister.

However, all of the evidence was right there before you. She had toyed with you her entire life, and sometimes you wondered if she even saw you as her sister, and not just a plaything. Often times Patty would sneak into your room at night, snatch you up, and chew you up like gum, or stick you to her body like a tattoo. No words, no explanations, no consent. She would just do it.

Finally finished, she set you down on her desk, and then reached for her bottle of Beta4. She grinned maliciously, and popped open the bottle. She dipped the brush that came with the bottle into the foreboding liquid, swirling it around. She pulled the brush out, and it had a large glob of Beta4 on it.

Patty had angled your now bra-like form on her desk in such a way that the inside of the cups was facing her. Your face, inside the right bra cup, was able to see everything that Patty was doing, and you assumed she had wanted it that way. As Patty moved the brush towards you, you began to panic.

You hoped some last minute miracle would occur that would save you from this situation, rescue you from your sister, but nothing happened. Fate was never kind to you, and it wouldn’t start now. Patty pressed the brush down on your face, the sticky and wet Beta4 substance soaking your head. Humming a little tune, Patty proceeded to paint every inch of your bra form with Beta4.

When Patty finished, she hid the Beta4 and the brush back in her closet, and then she blew several breaths onto you to help the Beta4 dry. Her breath was cold, and it chilled you. However, that wasn’t your major concern. Your major concern was the fact that there was absolutely no way for you to return to normal every again without the assistance of the solvent. You were currently trapped as a bra, and there was nothing you could do about it.

Patty picked you up off of her desk, rubbing her hands over your body. Her cold fingers brushed against your naked and hardened body, making you uncomfortable beyond belief.

You’re like, one hundred percent bra now. You even look like a perfect bra. You’re black and shiny all over, and I can’t even see your face unless I look really closely. This is perfect!” Patty giggled cruelly, while you began to mentally cry.

Patty stood up, lifting you up in the air with her. She reached a hand behind her back to take off her shirt and bra. You could tell she was planning to wear you. However, before she did so, she suddenly stopped and looked at you with an expression of thought.

“Hm…I really want to try you on Jill.” Patty mused. “But…I wonder if it would be even better if I gave you to mom.” Your eyes mentally grew wide, and you screamed “NO” over and over in your head. “That would be pretty awesome. She would have no idea. The ultimate torture, right Jill?” Patty winked at you.

12433221.content:
Six long months had passed since that initial day that Patty had turned you into a bra for your mother. You had been subjected to endless pain, torment, and humiliation at the hands (or rather, breasts) of your unaware mother. It tore you to pieces to see your mother in tears each night over your disappearance, your mother distraught, and your heartless sister with a cruel smirk on her face.

What you didn’t know is that Patty had exactly one compassionate bone in her body, and that bone had been aching like crazy for the past week. She couldn’t handle the stress and guilt anymore of seeing her parents sob over the loss of their precious, two-foot-tall, squishy daughter. It kept her up at night, her grades at school started to drop, and it was having a negative impact on her social life.

Finally, she couldn’t stand it anymore, and she took action. She bought the highest quality black bra she could find, and snuck into her mother’s room one night. She grabbed you from the underwear drawer, and replaced it with her new purchase, hoping Mary wouldn’t be able to tell the difference. She then brought you into her room and locked the door.

Coating you carefully in solvent, she methodically massaged your body, stimulating your muscles to reform quicker than usual. You could hardly tell what was going on, other than the clear fact that Patty was apparently saving you. For all you knew though, she was just preparing to place you into some other, hellish situation. Still, you were far too gooey, and far too exhausted to do anything about it.

It took Patty all night, but you finally reformed back to normal size, albeit naked. Patty rubbed her eyes, yawned, and then looked at you with a fierce expression. You couldn’t help but cower backwards.

“Alright squishy. You’re welcome.” Patty huffed. “Mom and Dad’s little depression party was awful. I hated seeing and hearing it every single freaking day. It kept me up at night.” Patty sighed, and you forced down a small smirk. Patty’s conscience was finally making an appearance for the first time in her entire life.

“So, I saved you. BUT, if you tell a single person in this world what I did to you, I will kill you. I will end your life. I will crumple you up, take you into the backyard, and bury you six feet under the ground. I will package you up and ship you to some rock bottom country on the other side of the world. I will melt you down and feed your liquid body through the sprinkler in our front lawn, spreading you every. You’d never reform, and even if you did, you’d be no more than an inch tall.”

“Patty…” You tried to speak up, but Patty slammed her hand down in front of you.

“Do I make myself clear Jill? If you tell anyone about this, I will ruin your life. Permanently.”

“…okay Patty.”

“Speak up squishy.” Patty smirked, gaining back her frustratingly arrogant attitude.

“Okay Patty. I understand.” You sulked, wiping away a tear. You just wanted your sister to love you and treat you like family. Not some toy she could abused whenever she wanted.

“Good. Now come with me.” Patty scooped you up into her hands, and rushed downstairs. Mary and Jack were sitting in the kitchen, finishing their dinner. Mary turned to look at Patty as she entered, and she spit out her food violently.

“OH MY GOD!!!” Mary screamed, causing Jack to jump to his feet.

“What is it honey?” Jack exclaimed, hugging his wife tightly. He looked at Patty, and gasped. You sat in Patty’s hands like a little doll, and waved.

“Hi mom. Hi dad.” You whispered meekly.

“I found Jill!” Patty explained, as she had already formulated her cover story. She spoke with just the right tone of excitement, concern, and relief. She was the world’s greatest manipulator. “Remember when we moved my room around a few months back? I happened to look under my bed for a magazine I lost, and I spotted a tiny tan blob. Jill was crushed under the right front leg of my bed frame when we moved it!”

“God no! Jill!” Mary reached forward and scooped you up into her arms. “I’m so sorry honey!” She sobbed uncontrollably, her tears soaking you. She squeezed your tiny body against her massive, jiggly breasts. Your dad joined in the hug too, and Patty compassionately rested her hand on your back.

You spent the next three hours cuddling with Mary on the couch while you watched your favorite TV show. Eventually, Mary ended up falling asleep, so you tucked yourself in between her boobs, though not too deep, and fell asleep to the lull of her heartbeat. After six long months, your life was finally back on track.

By the time Mary woke up, she had rolled around so much in her sleep that you were nothing but a sticker against her breast. Thankfully, she noticed you immediately. She peeled you off, let you reform, gave you a big kiss, and then made you a huge breakfast. You ate and laughed with your mom, smiling so much it hurt your face.

Suddenly, everything dawned on you all at once. Six months had passed since Patty had turned you into a bra. Six months without being able to attend school. Six months without seeing Ana or Kat. Six months without spending quality time with your mother and father. Six months without living your life. Six months had passed, and you would never, ever get that time back.

You began to scowl, and dark thoughts brewed in your mind. The one responsible for everything you had suffered was currently lying in her room, texting her friends. She had gotten off scot free, and would never pay for her crime unless you told your mother. She was sitting right in front of you. It was the perfect time to do it. At the same time though, Patty’s warning still flashed in your mind.

What do you do?

131132112.content:
You had slipped into unconsciousness again, and as your opened your eyes, you were assaulted by an oppressively bright light. You blinked over and over again, trying to adjust your focus. You went to raise your hand to wipe the sleep out of your eyes, only to find yourself unable to move. You were still totally encased in shit, with only your head poking out.

A bit of water washed up over your face, flooding into your mouth. It tasted very strongly of salt, and you tried to spit it back out. As your vision cleared, you saw several white birds floating around overhead. You recognized them as seagulls, and then realized what had happened to you. You had been flushed out to sea!

Just then, one of the seagulls dove down towards the water, splashing down right beside you. It pecked at your shit-encased body, causing you to scream in panic. Your loud cries caused the bird to jump back in shock, and take off into the sky. As it flew away, you realized it had managed to crack the shell holding you.

It took you a few hours, but you finally managed to break free of the disgusting mold of waste that had been holding your body. After another hour, you had reformed back to your normal size, though still naked and caked in dirt and shit. You paddled around for a few minutes, until spotting a small piece of driftwood. You flopped up onto the driftwood, and curled into a ball. The hard wood felt like a luxurious bed to you, and you soon fell into dreamland.

You were woken up by the loud crack of thunder in the sky. Dark clouds had set in, and it looked like a huge storm was brewing. Sure enough, the winds picked up and the waves began to churn violently over the next few minutes. You held onto your tiny piece of driftwood for dear life as a fifteen-foot-tall wave reared up over you. You couldn’t even hear your own screams over the sound of the ocean.

The wave crashed down onto you, knocking you free from your driftwood. You spiraled under the water, spinning head over heels and flailing like a madman. Everytime you broke the surface and gulped in air, another wave would shove you back down. Your body was taking an immense beating, and you were losing all feeling in your limbs.

Just when you thought it couldn’t get any worse, you felt something brush against your leg. Straining to see, your eyes nearly bulged out of their sockets as a large shark opened its jaws and sped back around towards you. You tried to swim out of the way, but the shark caught your foot in between its razor-sharp teeth, and you were dragged along behind it was it dove deep beneath the waves.

Eventually, your squishy leg became so flat that it slipped out of the shark’s mouth, and your body floated away as the shark carried on. Exhaustion like you had never experienced before set in, and you let your body slip into unconsciousness as your tiny self slowly floated back up to the surface, where the crazy storm was finally beginning to calm down.

When you awoke once more, the sun was back out, and you could hear the seagulls crying out from above. You also realized that you weren’t moving anymore, and that you were actually lying out on a bed of sand. You sat up and stared out at the ocean blearily, rubbing the sand off of your face. Your stomach rumbled, but you pushed that thought to the side. First and foremost, you had to figure out where you were.

You stood up, and wobbled for a few minutes before you regained feeling in your legs. You had apparently washed up on a beach, and out in the distance you could actually see people. Gathering up your strength, you ran down the beach, trying to get to someone as fast as you possibly could. It didn’t matter who it was, as long as they could help you get back home.

After a bit, you closed in on a group of three girls relaxing on their towels and getting tans. The girl closest to you had her phone lying out, so you crawled over and grabbed her phone. Thankfully, the girl was soundly asleep, and didn’t even stir.

You turned on the girl’s phone, and pressed the emergency GPS button. As the map loaded, you held your breath, anxiety, worry, and fear all swirling within you. Finally, the map popped up, and revealed that you were at a beach in…

You mentally screamed and screamed, but there was nothing you could do. Your chances of landing somewhere safe and reforming were dashed as your paper like body drifted through the doors of the kitchen.

Once inside the kitchen, the staff member took a sharp right. Another blast of air pushed your body off towards one of the chefs working near the back of the kitchen. Your floating form brushed up against the chef’s shoulder, but she didn’t feel a thing. She was deep in conversation with her friend on the other side of the kitchen. You bounced off her arm, and floated gently down into a large bowl of dough. You landed on the top of the pile of dough with a soft “plop”.

The distracted chef didn’t notice a thing, however, as she had been too engrossed in her conversation with her friend. She turned back to her station, completely oblivious of the small addition to her bowl of dough. She dumped the bowl of dough out on her countertop, the squishy material sloshing out of the bowl. Your tiny body was knocked underneath several clumps of dough, hiding you from sight.

The chef picked up her rolling pin, and began to squish the dough down into a large, flat circle. The heavy rolling pin pressed down on your body and the dough, squashing you and encasing you in the tasty food. However, food was the last thing on your mind right now, as you realized that if you didn’t escape before it was too late, you find yourself on a one way trip to someone’s stomach!

She finished spreading out the dough, and it now formed a flat, brown circle. Unfortunately, you were buried under the dough and still hidden from sight. You were helpless as the chef poured cheese, sauce, and various topping onto the pizza.
You felt yourself being lifted up, and you mentally gulped in fear. A minute later, the temperature all around you began to climb to insane heights. Within five minutes, you were boiling, your tiny body melting under the intense heat of the oven you were trapped in. You screamed and screamed in intense agony, but your silent pleas went unheard.

Finally, the pizza was done. The chef retrieved it from the oven, and breathed in the delicious smell. She handed the pizza off to a server, who carried you out into the main restaurant. You were whisked around the restaurant, and then placed down at a table. You heard feminine voices say thank you, and then the server left.

By this point, you wished that your body was not invulnerable. The oven had put you through torture you had never experience in your life. A normal person would have died within minutes, but you were kept alive the entire time due to your body’s unique capabilities. You wished that you had died, as every inch of your body cried out in pain.

You tried to bring your thoughts back to the current situation and away from your searing flesh. You had been delivered to two girls by the sound of it, and they were about to unknowingly devour you. However, what two girls are they?

“Jill?” Ana responded, innocently confused. Kat sat down beside Ana.

She’ll be fine.” Ana wanted to protest, but she knew Kat was right. She sank back in her chair in shame and embarrassment. The opening scene of the movie began to play.

The rest of the walk to the arcade was quick and uneventful. You easily reached the arcade, and stepped inside.

The arcade in the mall was huge, and it was filled with countless cabinets and games. All the newest games and oldest classics were there. Kat walked off to go buy some tokens, and Ana began scouting the arcade for fun games to play. You were left by yourself. What do you decide to do?

Out of the corner of your eye, you spotted the Dance Dance Revolution machine. Your face burst out into a huge grin, and you knew that that was where you wanted to go to. You began to head towards the machine, dodging underneath and around the many careless arcade visitors. Finally, you made it to the machine, and you stared up at it in awe.

The machine was huge, with the massive floor pad for dancing and a large TV that displayed the game. This particular Dance Dance Revolution machine was designed to be played by two people, so everything had to be constructed that much larger.

You climbed up onto the machine, and walked over to the player one section of the pad. You stood on the up arrow panel, and stomped on it as hard as you possibly could. The game cursor moved one spot on the song selection list in response to your stomp.

You continued to stomp on the up arrow over and over, cycling through the list of songs the machine had to offer. A bright smile grew on your face. You hadn’t even started dancing, and you were already having fun. Your attention was so focused on the game, that you didn’t even notice the teenaged girl walking towards the machine.

The girl’s attention was focused solely on her phone, which she held out in front of her. Her eyes were locked on her phone, and she paid no mind to what was on the machine’s TV, and certainly not what was on the ground beneath her. She stepped up onto the pad, standing on the player one section.

It wasn’t until both of the girl’s feet were on either side of you that you finally noticed her presence. Your attention broke from the game, and you turned around slowly, seeing the giant pair of legs on either side of you. You looked up in horror at the girl, but you didn’t even have time to scream as her titanic left foot lifted above your head, and the slammed right down onto you.

The sole of her sneaker crashed into your head with intense force, and slammed you down flat against the up arrow panel. You hadn’t even had time to react, and you were now crushed flat like a sticker to the up arrow panel. The girl’s dirty sneaker smelled gross, and pieces of dried mud splotched onto your body, adding insult to injury.

The girl noticed that the machine was already set to er favorite song, which was an incredible upbeat and exciting dance song. She was ready to work up a sweat, and dance like crazy. Of course, she had no idea that there was a scared and helpless squishy girl currently trapped underneath her foot.

The girl reached into her pockets, looking for money to play the game. However, did she remember to bring money with her today?
1331.title: Dance Dance Trouble

The girl lets other people play. It's someone else-
13311.content:
Her foot lifted off of your crumpled body as went to put some coins into the machine. You groaned softly, trying to unflatten while you had the chance, but the previous pressure and the thin layer of dirt kept you pinned long enough for the girls sneaker covered foot to come down upon you once more. You yelled quietly, unable to muster anything louder then a squeak with flattened lungs, as you saw your two friends standing idly by, waiting to use the machine.

The unaware teen exhaled, bouncing on her tip toes as she got ready, her heel flattening you further and further before she stepped off again. You barely managed to role your eyes upwards as the girl kicked off her shoes and took out her phone, placing them neatly on the side.
"A-ana, K-kat!" You tried to yell, your deflated lungs unable to grab anyones attention as a pair of worn black socks landed either side of you. You grimmiced as you watched them bounce, her toes curled in anticipation, unaware of the sticker trying to get her attention. Without much warning, the thinly socked foot crashed down upon her, pushing down rhythmically as the girl went through the menu's. An oddly thick oder washed over you as your body was pumped into the ground, the damp sock was obviously on it's way out, the fabric was so warn down underneath the ball and heel of her foot that you could easily see her skin.

"Hey- hold my drink a sec" You heard Ana say. Hope filled your tiny heart when you realised Kat would be overlooking the match, she had a talent for spotting you in these kind of messes. The foot peeled off of you to show your slightly ditzy friend hop onto the opposing DDR platform, Kat stood a little back with three drinks by a table, her eyes scanning the room for what you could only assume to be you.

Your unaware captor hopped up and down, it looked like she really took this game seriously! You paniced from your position on the game pad as you saw a few people wandering over, your dirt covered body unable to move as the game started-

The girl leaned back on the bar as the music began to play, her face studied the screen as she counted down under her breath. Ana and Kat were unable to hear or even distinguish you from the specks of dirt on the pad already as the random girl stomped down heavily upon you. You couldn't do anything as the mercyless foot spread you out over the pad, You desperatly looked over to Kat and Ana between the heavy beatings to see Ana stumbling around with Kat laughting. You whined softly as the oblivious experienced DDR player danced you into paste. Her feet slowly got worse and worse as she slowly began to sweat, enjoying aiming for perfect rather then simply winning against an obvious new player.

The song was over as quickly as it started, leaving you in a puddle of sweat and dirt unable to have any logical thoughts.
"Not bad" The girl muttered to herself, looking at her score as Ana and Kat wandered away, letting the next person have a go. You didn't even notice your last hope wandering away, your dirt stained body meekly lay by the slightly oderous body heat of the girl as she stepped off to check her phone. Your mind only just started to realise it was over as you heard more coins get dropped into the machine. Your body refused to move as you saw someone step onto the pad-
13311.title: Yes, and she plays the game, dancing all over you.

choices: Maria walks off, taking you (plastered to one of her socks) with her.
Maria leaves, leaving you on the dance pad, but curious Cindy returns!
133111.content:
The clinking noises of coins being slotted into the machine spelled certain doom for you. In your current position, there was nothing you could do to fight against the pounding feet of the oblivious girls above you. Kat and Ana had left, taking your only hope at rescue away with them. Whether the girl who had just danced all over you kept playing, or a new girl took her place, you knew that you were doomed.

“Hey! What’s your name?” You heard a girl ask, with a different voice than the professional who had just tortured you. You assumed that the new girl was speaking the girl right beside you.

“My name is Maria. Why do you ask?” The dancing girl replied.

“My name is Cindy. You danced pretty well in that last match.” Cindy puffed out her chest in a show of playful presence. The gathered audience laughed. “I happen to be a Dance Dance Revolution connoisseur myself. I challenge you.” She pointed dramatically to Maria, and the crowd cheered.

“Ha! I accept your challenge Cindy. Prepare to taste defeat!” Maria grinned, joining in on the playful banter. Cindy climbed onto the dance pad beside the one you were stuck to, and you saw Maria’s towering frame enter your vision once more. You braced yourself, as her giant sweaty feet stomped down onto your tired and beaten body. The girls selected their song, a hardcore song called “Ready, Steady, Go!” and prepared to dance.

You heard the muffled opening notes of the song, and realized you were in for a full course repeated of the hell you had just endured. The two unaware giantesses began their dancing frenzy, and you were mercilessly pounded over and over again, Maria’s heavy feet smacking the life out of you with every step.

Her feet would move for one second, giving you a brief chance to breathe and relax. However, your freedom would be short lived, always followed by the painful crashing of her disgusting feet half a second later. You couldn’t wiggle, or squirm, or do anything to alert your tormentor to your presence. Even if your mouth had been capable of speech, your screams would have been drowned out by the pulsing music beats and the cheering crowd.

The song continued, and Maria and Cindy were neck and neck. The two titans were panting heavily, each of them sweating profusely. All of Maria’s stick and smelly sweat dripped down onto your body, flowing into your crushed mouth and open eyes. Your eyes stung, and you were forced to swallow wave after wave of her gross sweat. You began to mentally cry, wishing only for the pain to end.

The song drew to a close, and Maria managed to pull ahead right at the very end with a string of perfect hits. She ended up beating Cindy by an incredibly small margin. Maria laughed weakly in triumph, and she shook hands with Cindy. Cindy was not a sore loser, and she graciously accepted that Maria was the better dancer.

Maria stepped off of you, checking her phone and taking several big gulps of water. You praised the heavens for your long break form torment, even though you knew it was impossible to reform before another girl stepped onto you. You stared up helplessly, watching as Cindy prepared to walk away and let another girl take her place.

Just then, Cindy dropped her phone, and it clattered to the ground right beside you. She swore under her breath, and bent down to retrieve her phone. As she picked up her phone, her eyes locked directly onto you, and she looked at you quizzically. Her eyes rose in confusion, and you could’ve sworn that she recognized you as a human being. Unfortunately, Cindy shook her head, and walked off out of sight.

You overheard an exchange between Maria and another girl in the crowd, and realized that the crowd had organized a challenge to try and defeat Maria. Maria had accepted the challenge, after the crowd promised she wouldn’t have to pay for the games she played. She stepped back into view, her black socks squashing your battered body once more. Hopes dashed, you resumed your mental sobs as the dancing continued.

For nearly five straight hours, Maria trampled and stomped all over you, dancing against girl after girl. The challengers never ceased, but Maria easily beat every single one of them. Over the course of the day, you had begun to feel your squishy body sticking to Maria’s dirty socks, only to stay on the dance pad at the last second. You knew if the dancing continued, you could end up plastered to Maria’s socks, which was a place you definitely did not want to be.

Another dance ended, and Maria remained on your body, unmoving. Once more, your gummy body started sticking to the strands of fabric on Maria’s socks, and you were unable to fight it. You heard Maria talking about how she was going to head home, and you knew that the next few seconds would determine your fate.
133111.title: The Professional

choices: You are able to reform and crawl out of the laundry
You stay stuck until Maria loads you into the washing machine
1331111.content:
Unfortunately, hours of being danced on by Maria caused your gummy body to peel away from the game pad and stick to her slightly dampened sock as she stepped off the machine and onto the arcade’s colorful carpet. Exhausted, Maria picked up her sneakers and began walking to the nearest table, completely unaware of the flattened tiny girl stuck to the bottom of her sock.

You mentally cursed your luck as Maria continued to squish your helpless body with every step she took. Being flattened face-first into a giant sock, you couldn’t see, hear, or even attempt to scream, but for some cruel reason your sense of smell remained in tact. The smell of Maria’s foot after dancing for 5 hours was worse than any smell you had ever encountered, and you spent a whole day in your mom’s high heel once by accident. The heat emanating from her hot skin didn’t do any favors for you, either, as your tiny body was prone to melting if you were exposed to high enough temperatures, causing your squishy body to seep further into the sweaty fabric as Maria continued her stride.

After a short walk, Maria sat down at an unoccupied table and was about to put her sneakers back on when she felt something slightly odd under her foot. Pushing her toes into the floor, Maria twisted her foot back and forth, feeling something small and squishy stuck to her sock. Assuming she stepped in some gum, Maria lifted her foot to her knee and examined her sole, finding a tannish sticker in the vague shape of a girl squished flat into her foot. Maria was intrigued, but she still didn’t want any gunk stuck to her sock. She attempted to peel it off with her fingernails, but whatever it was seemed to have melted into the fabric.

Shrugging her shoulders, Maria gave up on the gunk and put on her sneakers, causing tears to well up in your eyes as you prepared yourself to spend another undetermined amount of time as a living insole.

The combined smell of Maria’s old sneakers and her sweaty socks caused you to gag as she tied her laces. You hoped the intense odor would knock you out, but deep down you knew you wouldn’t be so lucky. Maria stood up and stomped her foot a few times, feeling strangely re-energized as she began walking to the arcade’s exit. For a moment she pondered on the sudden burst of energy, and decided that the girl-shaped gunk under her foot must be why.

After another hour or two of foot torture, Maria finally arrived home and kicked off her sneakers, causing to to relish in joy as you felt fresh air on your back. The joy was short-lived however, as you realized you were still squished into Maria’s sock. Remembering the gunk, Maria inspected her sole again and tried to peel you away, but you still wouldn’t budge. This frustrated Maria a little, but she figured she would try again later. Peeling her socks off, Maria crinkled her nose at the smell and tossed them into her laundry bin before leaving the room shortly after.
