13311111.content:
Laying in the mess, you barely managed to pull yourself off after just a few short hours. Pieces of the sock flaked off, simply giving up after so much abuse. It was a miracle that you could pull yourself together that fast, using pure force of will and weak biting to get free

Finally, your body flopped off the sock, tumbling out of the basket onto the floor. Twitching, you slowly turned your head- feeling too weak to move.
"Finally..." You spoke, feeling unable to move.

However, the idea of resting suddenly fled your mind as the girl, Maria, rounded the corner wearing some loose gym wear. The girl stretched happily, her barefeet wiggling on the cold floor. You groaned, willing your body to move again as she walked close.
"You have got to be kidding" You whined, weakly holding your arm up to defend yourself before the offending foot slammed down on you.

Maria slipped slightly on her way out, glancing back at seemingly nothing. Before she could think more, her phone rang in the other room.

Wandering over, your poor battered body was dripping wet already with sweat as you quickly flattened out every step. You started off peeling slighly off every so often, but after just a couple more steps you seemed to be firmly attached by the time she reached carpet.
"Hello? I'm leaving now. See you in a moment! Yeah, I played some DDR this morning but I showered afterwards" She spoke, grabbing her keys as she walked to the door. "Fine, not a fully shower, but I washed in the sink. It's fine, it's just Volleyball practice" She spoke, pinching the phone to her face using her shoulder as she sat down.

You felt yourself lift upwards, only to see a sock go over your form. You wince, trying to call out but it becomes too late as her foot falls down again.

You felt sick, your stomach turning as you felt you might never escape the girls foot.

Thankfully, she moved the sock down, her nails scratching at you as she scratched her foot.
13311111.title: Still not washed

choices: Cindy agress to take you home, but not until tomorrow morning.
Cindy's keeping you for herself. You're way too much fun!
1331112.content:
Maria stepped off from the machine, and lady luck smiled down upon you. The strands of Maria’s socks ripped clean from your body, and Maria’s sweaty self left your field of vision. You thought that you were going to be plastered to her socks, and be taking home with her, but you were not. Instead, you were left on the dance pad to reform of your own accord, and hopefully make it back to Kat and Ana before they left.

You started focusing on reforming, thankfully that no one else seemed to want to play DDR, at least for now. Your body was dirty, grimy, and caked with sweat, but you didn’t care. You would reform, and you would make it home safe and sound. At least, that’s what you thought until the massive form of Cindy, the girl from earlier, walked back into view.

You had no idea why Cindy had returned, but you suddenly felt a sinking feeling right in your gut. Cindy was looking straight at the ground, her piercing gaze seemingly directed right at you. She bent down, and her sharp fingernails pried you off of the dance pad with ease. Your flattened form rested in her hands, which were shockingly cold compared to Maria’s sweltering feet.

Cindy looked at you for a few seconds, before tucking you into her purse. She crumpled you up, squeezing you all the way into her tiny purse. You wanted to scream and yell at her, begging her to let you go, but it was useless. Cindy currently had no idea that you were a real, living person, and only wanted to find out what you were at her house.

Satisfied, Cindy zipped up her purse and walked out of the mall and to her car. To add insult to injury, she passed Kat and Ana on her way out. The twins were frantically looking for you, having no idea that you were so close as Cindy passed by. Unable to help, Cindy made it to her car, and then drove home.

Once home, Cindy walked inside and ran up to her bedroom. She closed and locked the door behind her, and then deposited the contents of her purse out, dumping your pathetic form onto her bed. Your messed up paper form sat there, and Cindy stared at you intently. Her eyes were filled with a childlike wonder and amazement, as she eagerly waited to see what you would become.

At this point, you almost didn’t want to reform. You didn’t know what Cindy would do to you if she found out that you were actually a small, squishy girl. Sadly, you had no control over your body’s natural properties, and the reforming process quickly began. Within half an hour, your body had returned to its normal state, with Cindy gasping and smiling the entire time. Once back to normal, you laid out on her bed, almost afraid to move. Your clothes had been torn off by Maria, so you were totally naked.

“Wow! You’re a gummy doll! I’ve always wanted one!” Cindy cried happily. Hearing her words filled you with fear. You shot up quickly, sitting on the edge of the teen’s bed. Cindy let out a short squeal at seeing you move.

“I’m not a gummy doll.” You protested, your voice quivering with fear.

“Wha…wha…wha…” Cindy stammered for a response, stuck between terror and excitement.

“Please. You have to help me.” You insisted. “My name is Jill Harper, son of Jack and Mary Harper. I have to get back home.”

“You…have a home?”

“What? Of course I have a home. I’m a normal human being.” You were slightly offended.

“But you’re so small. And you were flattened, and…”

“My body has unique, squishy properties. I can be flattened, melted, or anything in between. I always reform back.” You thought you were just being informative until a smile crept back onto Cindy’s face. You began to worry that you had said to much.

“Flattened…melted?”

“Well…yes…but I still feel pain!” You blurted quickly. You didn’t want this stranger to get the wrong idea. “Please! I just want to see my family again!” You begged. Cindy was silent for a while, giving you the strangest look. Finally, she spoke up.
1331112.title: Curious Cindy

choices: You sleep peacefully until Cindy comes home that night.
Cindy's mom comes downstairs and sits on the couch to watch TV.
13311121.content:
“Well sure! I can take you home!” Cindy smiled, and your heart was filled with joy. You breathed a sigh of relief. For a second there, you were convinced that this girl was going to keep you as a pet or slave, or something crazy like that. You knew too many sadistic girls in your life, so you really didn’t need to know another one. It was refreshing to meet someone nice like Cindy.

“That’s awesome!” You declared, unable to contain your enthusiasm.

“Well, it will have to be tomorrow morning. For sure.” Cindy nodded her head, but you were confused. Cindy pointed towards her bedroom window, and you followed her direction. The sky was pitch black, and only the twinkling stars could be seen.

“What in the world?” You cried.

“It’s ten o’clock at night. What time did you think it was silly?” Cindy laughed. “You can stay with me tonight, and I’ll take you home in the morning tomorrow.” Without waiting for a reply, Cindy snatched you up and lifted you off of the ground. You tried to protest, but your words caught in your throat with a gasp. Cindy’s thumb was pressing down hard on your exposed crotch, as you were still naked after all.

Cindy set you down on her bed, and smiled at seeing you squirm around. She thought you were just excited to be safe, but you had actually been overwhelmed by a brief wave of sexual pleasure. While you were preoccupied, Cindy stripped out of all of her clothes, as she preferred to sleep naked.

By the time you finally calmed down, you were just in time to see Cindy’s massive, naked body descend onto her bed. You screamed, and rolled out of the way, but Cindy was nowhere close to lying on you.

“Relax Jill! I’m not going to hurt you!” Cindy promised, and the she flicked off the light by her bed, casting the room into darkness. You heard the sounds of Cindy shuffling a bit, and it also caused her bed to bounce a little. After ten minutes, the shuffling stopped, and was replaced by Cindy’s steady breathing. She had fallen asleep.

You took several deep breaths, and tried to calm yourself down. This girl was nice, and she wasn’t going to hurt you. You would be perfectly fine. You would be taken back to your house in the morning, and everything would go back to normal. All you had to do was drift into slumber, and everything would…

The entire bed began to shake, and your body was tossed up and down. In the dim light shining in through the window, you saw Cindy’s sleeping body begin to roll over towards you. Her giant naked breasts were about to steamroll you! You cried out in fear, and jumped to your feet. You sprinted a bit, and jumped out of the way just in time. However, your leap also caused you to topple off of Cindy’s bed and crash down onto the floor.

Your body was slightly squished from your fall, but at least your weren’t crushed like a bug under Cindy’s heavy mounds of flesh she called breasts. You would have hated to spend ten hours under her, and be nothing more than a tattoo in the morning. You heard the sounds of Cindy continuing to breathe soundly. Clearly she had not been disturbed at all by the terror you had just faced.

You didn’t bother climbing back up onto the bed. Cindy had knocked a pillow off onto the ground, so you had a perfect place to sleep. Cindy was certainly one of the nicer girls you had ever met, but no matter how nice the girl, everyone had their own oblivious tendencies. Cindy couldn’t control her sleeping body, so you decided to just steer clear as to avoid an accident. Instead, you curled up on the pillow, and safely drifted off to sleep after a while.

***

You were woken up by the sounds of drawers being opened and closed. You sat up on your pillow bed, and rubbed the sleep out of your eyes. As you vision adjusted to the bright light, you saw Cindy up and about, just finishing getting dressed. She was wearing black leggings and a cute t-shirt, as well as flip-flops. One thing you noticed was that Cindy didn’t so much as glance in your direction. In fact, she walked right out of the room when she was dressed, turning off the light behind her.

You were immediately alerted to just what was going on, and you raced out of the room after Cindy. Being one foot tall, it was hard to even attempt to keep up with the pace of Cindy, but you tried your hardest. Unfortunately, it wasn’t enough. By the time you made it out of Cindy’s bedroom, you heard the front door slam closed. Cindy had left for the mall for another fun day, and had totally forgotten about you.

You decided it would be best to wait for Cindy downstairs. As you approached the steps, you noticed a door that was closed, but you heard the sounds of someone sleeping from within. You figured that it was probably Cindy’ mother. You didn’t want to have to deal with anyone else, so you quietly crept downstairs as to avoid waking the giantess.

Once downstairs, you headed into the living room, where there was a small couch in front of a big TV. You managed to crawl up onto the couch, as you figured it would be a comfortable and safe place to wait for Cindy to return. Confident that everything would turn out okay, you laid down on the couch, and fell asleep once again.

You slept soundly on the couch, curling up adorably as you hugged the cushion. Even though you had a full nights sleep, you still felt tired from everything that had happened. In your sweet, blissful slumber you didn't hear Cindy's mom coming downstairs to get coffee. The Blonde bombshell of a woman stumbled past the Couch on her way to the kitchen, only wearing a nightdress and slippers, rubbing her eyes. Afew minutes later she came back into the living room with a plate of toast and a cup of coffee and without even checking the couch (why would she) she plopped her ass down and wriggled it a bit to get comfy. Turning on the television to relax and wake up.

The moment her weight crashed down ontop of you, you woke with a start, but it was too late. Before you could react, you were already compressed flat, molded her her perfect ass cheeks. You realised it must be Cindy's mom ontop of you and you felt her wriggle to get comfy, grinding against your squishy body. You sighed wondering what you had possibly done in a past life to deserve this kind of luck, but no god popped up to explain it to you, so you remained in ignorance. After slipping her pantiehose covered feet into her heels, she scooped you up again and with a smile, tucked you away down her cleavage once more. 13311122.content:
Cindy stared at you for a few nerve wracking minutes of silence with that grin on her face before she snorted with laughter. "I don't know how you can talk but there's no way your human!" She declared. You opened your mouth to protest, urgently needing to convince this girl but she simply pinched your lips shut and pressed down sliding across your mouth and squishing your mouth away, leaving you silent.

"See if you were a person, no way that would have worked!" She said with her own terrifying logic. "Just because you can move and talk doesn't stop you being my new gummy doll. I can't wait to play with you." You whimpered silently and quickly tried to scramble away from her off the bed, but she easilly grabbed you and lifted you up in her hands before you made it a foot.

She casually began crushing parts of your body, making you smaller and smaller but still human shape. She giggled and posed you, holding your arms up and made you twirl like a ballerina. This girl clearly was not going to treat you like a person. All you could do was wriggle and squirm as she easily manipulated you how she wanted, you had never felt more helpless while three dimensional...well that wasn't true, your sister had used you as a doll many times growing up, but this was with the high chance of being permanent.

Eventually she got bored of twirling you around and just crushed you up into a ball, rolling you smooth between her hands. With you in an easy to manage shape she opened up a little jewellery box and pushed you in, your sides pressing against the sides of the box. "You can stay there while I go get you some accessories!" She said before pushing down the lid which squished down on you and you heard the telltale sound of a lock clicking shut as she turned a little key. You weren't getting out of this box until she wanted you to.

You were unsure how long you had stayed in that box, the faint sounds of birds chirping in a tree outside her room did. It help you keep track of time passing. You were pretty sure you drifted off a few times but eventually you woke at the sound of a lock being opened and the kid being lifted.

Cindy grinned down at you and scooped you out of the box, placing you inside something that lay on her bed and waited for you to reform. As you did, she reached into the thing and fed your arms and head through holes, your legs sticking out the bottom. You realised with horror that this was a gummy dress for a gummy doll. While you were still reforming you saw and felt her smear some liquid gum around the neck and arm holes, sealing the dress to you and basically bonding you to its material. Then you saw something worse, she had gummy make up paints. Designed to give gummy dolls a makeover, without solvent they were as permanent as sticking your head in cement.

Cindy got to work, forcing your still reforming lips into a cute dolly pout and painted them, you felt it fuse and effectively deal your mouth shut while making you look adorable. She added pink glittery blush that melted into your cheeks so they sparkled. She gave you pink eyeshadow that glittered as well and attached gummy eyelashes that were only ever used on dolls, they made you flutter your eyes as they were heavy. Then she ruined your hair, at least in your eyes. She forced your blonde locks into cute dolly style ringlets and stuck a pair of gummy pink bows in on the sides then sprayed gummy seal all over your hair, forcing it to stay like that unless she had a solvent, which you doubted.

Last but not least though, she flipped you over, lifted your many gummy petticoats and skirts and wrote something in gummy makeup on your left butt cheek. Her work done, she flipped you back over and tidied away the accessories she had bought. 133131.content:
A few hours passed, and the arcade was getting close to shutting down. Through the vibrations in the ground, you could tell that someone was walking over towards the DDR machine. Mentally sobbing, you had hoped that maybe you would be able to reform before another girl came to unknowingly torture you beneath her feet.

However, who you saw both averted your expectations, as well as presented a whole new problem for you to endure. You saw a girl in her twenties, wearing the standard uniform of an arcade employee, bend down beside the machine, holding a scraper in her hand. It didn’t take a genius to figure out what was coming next.

With a strong amount of force, the oblivious employee scraped off all of the gunk that had collected on the dance pad throughout the day. This, as you found out, included you, as the girl scraped your battered and blobby body off of the pad. Unceremoniously, the girl dumped you into a small bag, tied the bag shut, and walked away from the DDR machine.

She tossed the bag into the trash can behind the prize booth, and then went about turning off every single arcade game. Once all the machines were powered down, she flicked off the light, pulled down the gate outside of the arcade, and left. The mall proper closed down thirty minutes later. Everything was dark, save for a few glowing EXIT signs, and eerily quiet.

Inside of the small bag you had been sealed in, you furiously poured every ounce of strength you had left into reforming. Slowly but surely, your body popped back to normal size. Using a sharp rock that had also been placed into the bag, you ripped a hole free and climbed out. It took you a while after that to reform back to one-foot tall, and then you shimmied up out of the trash can.

You lamented the fact that your clothes had been ripped to shreds, and that your normally beautiful skin was coated in dirt and grime, but that was secondary to escaping this arcade. After letting your eyes adjust to the darkness of the arcade, and using the glow from the EXIT light to guide you, you contemplated how you would escape the prize booth. It was a small and enclosed area, the only simple exit being a large swinging gate that was currently locked.

Thankfully, the arcade girl had left her jacket, which was hanging over the edge of the counter. Grabbing the jacket, and working quickly, you scampered up the glass counter, intending to reach the top of the counter, and then jump down the other side. However, you underestimated how much a one-foot tall squishy girl weighed, and your weight dragged the jacket down. Not only did it drag down the jacket, but it also knocked over the tiny little bottle that had been resting on top of the jacket.

You crashed back down on the floor inside of the prize booth, and the jacket fell beside you. You winced as cold liquid poured out of the bottle you had tipped over, and washed over your body. Wiping the substance off of your face, you tried to sit up, only to have your arms and legs seize up. Your chest began to harden, and your face froze. You realized with fear that you had just accidentally coated yourself in Beta4.

Unfortunately, it was too late to do anything about it. The chemical soaked into your gummy body, and completely froze you. Your body hardened, just as any gummy substance does when coated in Beta4. You had been so focused on escaping that you hadn’t paid attention to your surroundings, and you had paid the price for it.

***

Twelve long hours passed, in which you were unable to do anything but stare up into the air, mentally sobbing. You heard the gate being lifted, and saw the lights flicking on. Soon, you could feel footsteps approaching, and the gate to the prize booth opening. Moments later, the same attractive employee from yesterday towered over you, looking down in confusion.

“Huh. I wondered where my jacket was.” She said, picking up her jacket. “It looks like my Beta4 bottle tipped over. Damn. I was looking forward to molding some of my own gummy clothing.” The girl stuffed her jacket into her purse, and tossed the empty bottle into the trash. “Also, why are you out of your packaging?”

The girl scooped you up into her arms and stood up. She brushed a few specks of dust off of your otherwise pristine body. The Beta4 had washed away all of the dirt and grime from your body, leaving you looking like any other “fresh of the conveyor belt” doll. Even your face, which had been captured in a brief moment where you thought the end was in sight, was frozen in an irresistibly attractive smile. You looked just like a normal, everyday doll.

“Let’s fix you up a bit.” The girl said aloud, rummaging around for an empty box. Upon finding one, she slid you inside, and sealed the box shut. The box was so small and tight, so you were positioned in an upright pose. The blissfully unaware employee slapped a ticket price onto the box, and shelved you beside all of the other dolls and girl toys the arcade offered as prizes.

As the employee went about turning all of the machines on, and the first few visitors started entering, you struggled to remain calm. An everyday trip to the mall with your best friends had suddenly turned into a horrible situation, and there wasn’t a thing you could do about.

Several girls came up to the prize booth with tickets in hands as the day went on, and each time you thought they would buy you. You mentally whined and moaned as everyone who spotted you complimented the “cute and sexy doll”. Your naked body was on display for all to see and marvel at. You had never felt more ashamed or humiliated in your life.

Just then, out of the corner of your eye, you spotted Kat and Ana walking into the arcade. They both had worried looks on their faces. You felt a sense of hope rise up within you. They had returned to rescue you!

Kat started searching all of the machines, while Ana walked straight up to the prize counter. She set her purse down on the counter, and pulled out a huge wad of tickets.

“What would you like?” The cute arcade employee asked.

“I don’t know.” Ana sighed.

“What’s wrong miss?” The employee asked, sensing Ana's hesitation.

“Me and my sister are looking for my friend. We last saw her here yesterday.” Ana explained. Lazily, her eyes skimmed the shelves for a prize to trade her tickets for.

“I’m sorry to hear that. I hope you find her.” The employee politely said, before stepping to the side to allow Ana to see the full range of prizes. As she did so, Ana was able to look right at you. You wished desperately to blink and let her know it was you, but you could only stay frozen and stare at her with your innocent, plastered smile.

Ana stared at you for several seconds, and finally opened her mouth to speak. What does she say?

133222.content:
You look through the glass of your prison, as much as you hated to admit it you'd been in situations like this before and you knew the drill. "Play doll" so to speak until you could escape, if you looked like just another doll in the claw game hopefully no one would pay you any more mind than they did the other dolls. If, however you gave yourself away as a small human many people would soon be rushing at the chance to win you. So you sat as still as possible trying to mimic the dolls. A few hours pass and you see several teen boys come into the arcade what made them stand out was they had a little girl looking no older than five struggling to keep up and carry her doll which looked to be about your size.

"Okay Caroline" said one of the teens who had the same shade of brown hair as the little girl "here's five bucks, do whatever you want just try not to be a pain for once." and with that he and his friends took up ranks at a shooting game.

"Jerk!" you couldn't help but yell, big mistake because Caroline heard you and looked your way.

You quickly resumed your doll pose as Caroline walks over to the machine and looks inward you can only pray she's looking at the doll next to you. "Hannah" Caroline looked toward her doll "I thought I heard that doll talk on her own!"

"You're being silly Carrie" Caroline spoke through her doll.

"You're probably right Hannah" Caroline responded.

"please go away, please go away, please go away" you pray. For a moment she turns away and you breathe a sigh of relief however before she's entirely turned her back to you she quickly returns her gaze to the machine and this time there is no mistaking it she's looking directly at you!

"She's pretty huh Hannah?" Caroline questioned.

"Yes, she's very pretty and she looks very nice" Caroline responded through Hannah.

"She looks like she's as big as you too!” Caroline added “you two could probably share clothes.”

“Oh that would be fun Carrie! In fact, now that I look at her I think she’s my long lost sister Becky!” Caroline spoke through Hannah and pretend to be surprised.

“Then we need to take her home with us!” Caroline happily as she inserted her five-dollar bill into the machine.

Instantly the machine lit up brighter and played festive music “you have 20 credits good luck” said a computerized voice. Caroline put Hannah down to focus all her concentration on winning you. Her first try she actually lowered the claw right over the prize drop her next few tries were little more success but soon enough she was beginning to get closer and closer to you. Soon enough you had to slowly back away to avoid the claw until you were literally caught in a corner!

“You have 1 credit reaming” the machine recited. You watched as the claw came closer and closer eventually hovering over you like a vulture you can only pray she misses as she silver claw comes down!

All of a sudden you had a sense of weightlessness as the claw let go and you plummeted down the chute, landing face first on the bottom smashing your face and squishing your lips shut.

Caroline opened the hatch and fished you out, holding you around your waist as she bounced you in her hand "Oh thank goodness you found me Hannah and Carrie, I thought i would be lost forever" She said talking for you as she grinned so happily. You couldnt bring yourself to squirm around and break the illusion, she seemed like a sweet girl. She cuddled you up to her happily and walked along to find her big brothers now she had won her new doll.

She sat down waiting for her brothers to finish their games and began fussing over her new doll. She looked you over and giggled putting on the voice she had chosen for you "My clothes are so boring, i need some pretty clothes like my sister Hannah, yes indeed!" before having "Hannah" respond with "Oh definatly, you can borrow some of my clothes when we get home i promise" Before she heard her big brother tell her to shut up.

Caroline pouted but stopped talking as she just cuddled and cradled her new doll, while you tried to glance around unnoticed to see any sign of Kat or Ana who might get you out of this mess, your lips still stuck together but slowly popping back to normal.

Bored with nothing to do now she had spent all her money winning you, Caroline pulled a little dolly make up kit out of her bag and casually began painting your face up to look super girly and pretty like a doll, she smiled to herself as she gave you a makeover, unaware that you were a real person. It didnt take long before your lips were coated in a sticky, glossy pink coating that made sure you wouldn't be talking any time soon.

Eventually, her brothers had finished having their fun and told Caroline to get her stuff together. She put the make up kit away, picked up Hannah and you before hugging you both tight to her body, you could see Ana and Kat in the distance wandering around. You tried to squirm loose of Carolines tight grip but she had a pretty firm hold on you and you could barely twitch pressed so tight to her as she began to leave with her brothers. If you didnt break free and get to your friends you would be having tea parties and dress up sessions for the forseeable future with Caroline and your new Dolly sister Hannah...

13322212.content:
Right as Caroline as about to walk out of the arcade, her body shook, and she let out a huge sneeze. The sneeze was so loud that even her older brother jumped. As Caroline sneezed, you flew out of her hands, landing on the ground a few feet behind her. Caroline wiped at her nose and spun around to find where her precious new doll had landed.

Not wasting a second, you leapt to your feet and jumped in between two “Tekken” machines that had just enough space between them for you to fit. You disappeared into the darkness between the two machines, and shimmied your way through. You could see Caroline peeking through the end you had gone into, a horrified look on her face.

As your previous captor screamed, and her older brother picked her up and carried her out of the arcade, ignoring her protests, you breathed a sigh of relief. Emerging from the other side of the little crawl space, you found yourself much closer to Kat and Ana. However, to your shock, they were just about to leave the arcade too.

As your giantess friends began strolling away, you pumped your tiny legs as hard as you could, struggling to catch up to them. Thankfully, Ana paused to fidget with the straps of her bra, letting her purse rest on the ground. You ran harder than you ever had before in your entire life, and dove into her purse, sinking down into the giant handbag.

No sooner had you jumped in then Ana lifted her purse back up, and the two sisters walked out of the mall. You had completely slipped both of their minds, but for different reasons. Ana was just an incredibly forgetful and often oblivious girl, and so it had only taken ten minutes of playing an arcade game to forget you. Kat had a much better memory, but she was preoccupied with thinking about the big championship basketball game she was going to watch as soon as she got home.

As the twins walked and chatted, you tried to sit up an alert them to your presence. However, Ana kept swinging her purse back and forth in huge arcs, and you kept rolling around and bumping into her various belongings. Eventually, you just gave up, and decided to wait until she set the purse down to climb out of her purse.

You got your wish, as Ana and Kat stopped at a small gummy store. Ana actually wanted to practice making gummy clothing and toys, with her deep-down intention being to give you gifts. As your friendship with her had deepened, Ana had developed a secret crush on you, but was too shy to say anything about it. You also had developing feelings for her, and had considering finally mentioning it to her someday.

Ana bought two pink gummy orbs, and a small spray bottle of Beta4. After checking her new purchases with the cashier, she dropped them down into her purse, without even looking down. The red gummy orbs landed on either side of you, but the Beta4 spray bottle landed on its end, causing the spray to trigger.

A big misty cloud of Beta4 shot out of the bottle, and coated your gummy body. You let out a horrified, muffled scream, as your mouth was still sealed shut by the lipstick Caroline had applied to you. You thrashed violently, and kicked and screamed as the Beta4 began to freeze your body solid. Unfortunately, while still looking at Kat, Ana had zipped her purse shut, and your suffering went unnoticed.

The twins headed out to the parking lot, and they drove back to their house. Once home, Kat raced into the living room to turn on the game, while Ana carried her purse up into her room, closing the door behind her. She dumped the contents of her purse out onto her bed, and your now one hundred percent doll-like form toppled out and onto Ana’s pink, fluffy bed.

“Oh my gosh! What is…that?” Ana gasped, her voice familiarly light and soft-spoken. She picked up your foot-tall body and carefully ran her hands cross you, feeling every inch of you. “Huh. It’s a super cute little doll. Where did it come from?” Ana sat down on the edge of her bed, absentmindedly playing with your hair.

You felt defeated, all of your hope rushing out of your soul. Your only chance at rescue had failed, and your brilliant escape plan had done nothing but change your owner. Instead of being the possession of a little girl named Caroline, you were the possession of your best friend, and crush. Your face, obscured by the abundance of beautiful makeup Caroline had covered it in, went unrecognized by Ana.

“Oh. I get it.” Ana smiled, her radiant expression exuding beauty. “Kat must have won it at the arcade, and given it to me as a secret present.” Ana giggled. “She’s such a great sister.” She turned and looked at you, her expression filling you with fear. “I know just what to do with you.”

Before doing anything else, Ana rushed downstairs to thank her sister for buying her a new doll. Kat, who was absorbed in the championship basketball game, barely acknowledged Ana’s hug and words of thanks. She merely responded with a quick “yeah, sure thing”, and went back to watching the game, not even processing what Ana had just said. Ana skipped back upstairs after that, ready to start enjoying her sister’s thoughtful gift.

First, Ana carefully slipped off the clothes you were wearing, and tucked them away in a small drawer. From the same drawer, she pulled out a perfect replica of the iconic “Sailor Moon” outfit. A few minutes later, and you were dressed in that outfit. Ana finished by touching up your makeup a bit, and then she posed your body into a sexy and humiliating position.

Blushing slightly, Ana placed you on the shelf that hung above the desk by her bed, beside a few other anime and video game dolls and statues. You fit right in, and honestly looked exactly like an official “Sailor Moon” product. To make matters worse, the Beta4 spray prevented you from moving or speaking, and kept you from every reforming without solvent. It also made the makeup on your face permanent, it made your skin feel just like a doll’s, and it masked your body’s natural scent. Pretty much, unless a miracle occurred, no one would ever find you.

Ana then placed the two gummy orbs and the Beta4 spray on her desk, which was below the shelf you were on, and sat down. She dutifully squeezed and molded the gummy orbs, trying her hardest to make something fun and unique. She often messed up, but she had a big bowl of gummy solvent that she repeatedly used whenever she wanted to start over. You watched her work out of the corner of your peripheral vision, wondering if this was destined to be the rest of your life.

What happens next?

133222122.content:
You watched Ana mold her gummy orbs for hours that evening, trying frantically and failing completly to get her attention in any way. As far as your friend was concerned, you were just her newest doll decorating the shelf. Eventually however, it was time for her to get some sleep and you watched her unblinkingly as she got ready for bed, turned out the light and was soon sleeping soundly. Blissfully unaware of her friend held in a pose, captive on her shelf. Due to the angle you were placed at, you could see her move around in her sleep, unable to close your own eyes for a nap. You wondered how long you would be trapped as Sailor Moon. If only you could move at all, then you could fall into the bowl of solvent Ana had left out below you, ending this nightmare.

Sadly it seemed unlikely to happen, your body was totally immobile, only able to be posed by outside forces and you knew Ana was quite a tidy person, she wouldn't leave that bowl out forever. When that solvent went away, so would any hope of escaping this fate as a collectors item. Sure enough, in the morning you watched Ana leave to get breakfast, come back upstairs, get changed for the day and then pour the solvent into a bottle and tidy away the gummy things and then leave the room. A short while later you heard her and Kat call out a goodbye to their mothers and then the sound of the front door slamming, signalling your friends likely leaving for school.

You stared boredly out into Ana's room for a while before hearing the sound of a vacuum cleaner moving around the house, before Stacy came in vacuuming Ana's floor, glancing casually up at her daughters assortment of dolls before going back to her cleaning. She had stared right at you, but sadly had not noticed anything. At the moment you did blend perfectly in with your surrounding doll sisters and could only watch as she finished cleaning the room and left again, closing the door behind her.

The rest of your day was mind numbingly boring, staring out at an empty room waiting for Ana to get back. Was this really going to be your life now? forever posed, smiling and bored as you waited for people to move past your field of vision simply so you had something to look at? You didn't know, but you really hoped not.

Eventually however, your boredom came to an end as Ana opened her bedroom door, putting her bag down by the bed and flopping down on it, playing a game on her phone. You were so happy to see her, glad not to be staring at nothing at least. Once she was done with her game, she slid her phone in her pocket and smiled "Right, lets get back to practicing gummy" She said cheerfully to herself. She got up, grabbing the bottles, the orbs and the bowl again. She refilled the bowl with solvent and sat down just within your vision as she practiced trying to make things, getting pretty good as she did it.

After an hour you heard Stacy call up the stairs "Ana, Kat, dinner time girls!" Before Ana's stomach growled in response. "Coming Mom" She called out before putting down the gummy skirt she had made. 13522.content:
Your mom sighed as she sat you on her dresser to explain yourself. You told her about your friends having to leave suddenly, your sister bringing you home, and your mom stomping you flat and crushing you into her panties. "Jill, you need to be more careful from now on", your mom said as she gave you a kiss on the head. "Well, I guess you heard about the carnival", she said. "I was hoping to keep it a secret, but I suppose it isn't much of one anymore."

"So... is Dad gonna show up?", you asked.

"He said he'll try his best, but he didn't want to promise anything", she said. "Maybe you ought to stay with me until this weekend. I'd hate for something to ruin this." Even your mom knew that misfortune was an inevitability for you, but she at least wanted to prolong it.

"Well... alright, but be careful", you said as your mom picked you up.

===============

Over the next few days, you stayed close with your mother, having moved your bed onto her dresser. You had a few close encounters, but nothing actually happened. You learned a few things while you were hanging out with her, too. Like how she and your dad first met. She told you the story of how she accidentally sat on him when they were little kids, and how they had stuck close together ever since she found him. You thought that was sweet.

Eventually, the day you were supposed to go to the carnival came. Your mom had gotten tired of waiting for your dad and took off without you, leaving your friends to pick you up while your sister picked up your cousins.

================

"Hello", you heard a familiar voice call out. "I'm not too late, am I?"

"*gasp* Dad!" You hopped down from the couch and ran to the door way. There, you saw what looked like a well-dressed young boy that towered over you, but not really anyone else. You ran up to him and jumped onto him, giving him a tight hug. "Dad, I'm so glad you could make it!", you said as your dad picked you up.

"Hehe, it's great to see you, too, Jill", he smiled as he gave you a kiss on the forehead. Suddenly, both of your worlds were rocked as you felt both of you being lifted up before you were sandwiched between both your dad and someone else.

"Heya, Uncle Jackie!", Kat said as she hugged the both of you tightly.

"Hi, Mister Harper", you heard Ana greet. They had apparently arrived right after your dad. Your friends had a pretty good relationship with your dad. Back before he ran the company full time, he used to help babysit them when Stacy and Emma would go out with your mom for drinks, which was how you first met them. They gave him a rough time at first, but they started going easier on him once you played with the girls more. They saw him as sort of a father figure, and affectionately referred to him as their "Uncle Jackie".

"Mmf! H-hello girls", your dad said as he was being gripped by Kat, his face pressed into her breasts (Kat inherited a bit of Stacy's flirty nature). "Nice to see you're doing well." She then put him back down and peeled you off of her belly as the girls giggled at your dad, his face deformed a bit from Kat's breasts. "You wouldn't happen to know where Miss Harper is, would you?"

"She went on ahead and forgot Jill here. She was pretty upset at something", Ana said in sort of a half-whisper. "Patty's supposed to be picking up Sam and Lucy."

"Oh dear. That's not good", Jack said under his breath. "Well, I guess we had better get going", he said as your friends followed him.

"I'll drive", Kat said as she picked your dad up and tossed him in the front seat as she set you in the cupholder. Your dad barely had time to adjust himself before a loud *SQUELCH* was heard as he was squashed underneath Ana's plump behind. "Seriously, Ana? Again?", Kat giggled.

"Huh? Oh jeez!", Ana blushed heavily as she stood up and peeled your dad off of her butt, causing Kat to laugh while you snickered a bit. "Mister Harper, I'm so sorry! I-I didn't see you there, and..."

"*sigh* It's alright, Ana", he said as he began to reform. "Just be sure to look down before you sit from now on, alright? If you're not careful, someone might pull a nasty prank on you", he said gently.

"Y-yessir", she said as she set Jack in the backseat.

Within about ten minutes, the four of you had arrived at the carnival. Your dad set you on his shoulders as your friends accompanied him to the ticket booth and handed the attendant three tickets. "I'm sorry, girls, but I'm afraid your little brother is going to have to leave his toy behind", the girl said.

"Hmph! I'll have you know that I happen to be the CEO of..."

Your dad was quickly shushed by Kat. "Come on, please. He can't go anywhere without it, and I really don't want to see him cry", she said sincerely.

"Oh alright. Just hold on tight to it, okay little guy", the attendant said, pinching your dad's cheek as the four of you entered.


Your dad grumbled as he looked up at Kat. "What? We can get a refund for this extra ticket and have some extra money to spend", she said. "We're gonna go cash this in. You two have fun", she said as your dad walked toward the rides.

"Hey, you gotta admit, that was pretty smart", you said as you held onto your dad's shoulder-length hair.

"Well, sure, maybe. But I still want to have some of my digni-" Your dad was suddenly stopped by the carnival worker in the entrance to the rides.

"I'm sorry, little boy, but I'm afraid you can't come in here without your parents", the girl said.

"Are you kidding me?!", your dad yelled up at the worker. "I'm a freaking adult, look at my licence!", he said as he held his wallet up. "I'm pushing fourty!" Your dad always got defensive when someone questioned his age. It started with mild annoyance when he was a teenager, but it had started to wear on his nerves over the years. The incident a little while ago didn't exactly help matters.

"Nice try, kid", the girl said handing his wallet back. "People show me fake IDs all the time. Now take your little doll and go get your parents."

Jack grumbled as the attendant shoved him aside as he held onto you before being pushed back into the snack area. "*sigh* Well, I'm sorry, Jill", he said. " 'Fraid we won't be enjoying the rides with all the normal folks", he said sadly.

"Hey, why don't we ask one of the girls to come with us", you suggested. "They can help us get in."

"I don't know...", your dad said. "Nothing against your friends, but... they aren't exactly the most careful folks. I... I think I'd feel better waiting for your sister." It had been a while, and your dad had long forgotten about Patty threatening him. He hadn't been made aware of your sister messing with you, either, nor had he spent much time with your cousins.

"But dad..."


"Jill, please trust me", he said. "I think I know what I'm doing."

He stood there for a moment before deciding to...

Thankfully, as you pushed on the lid, it popped open. There was no need to lock a prop box in the ghost train, climbing out you looked down at your creepy doll dress, white but smeared with fake blood. Glancing around the scene of the creepy little girls room you tried to figure out in the darkness where the exit was. Only small slivers of light showing shapes and colours of anything. You rubbed at the fake blood sealing your lips shut but it was rock hard, stopping you from calling out for help.

You gathered up your dolly skirts and began feeling your way through the dark, now shut, ride. You frightened yourself dozens of times as you brushed against props, mannequins and the like. Eventually however, you managed to find a small maintenace hatch that wasnt locked and crawled through it. You blinked in the moonlight as you got outside and heard the eerie silence of the now closed Amusement park. All the rides shut down, all the stalls closed. No sign of any staff anywhere as you stood there looking like something from a horror film.

It took you over an hour to find the exit to the car park and with a faint whine from behind your lips you saw that, it too was also empty, your friends and family had left you behind. All through the night you walked along down the road to town, as the sun slowly began to rise over the horizon, you were totally exausted, ready to drop.

You saw a metal fence near a large church like building ahead. Glancing past it you saw it would be a major short cut back home, so you quickly climb over the fence. The spikes on top were dangerous for most people, but your gummy body can easilly squeeze between them. One of the few perks of being you. However, your dress wasnt so lucky. As you leapt to jump down, it caught on a spike and tore right off, leaving you to fall down face first, totally nude.

The impact cracked the fake blood at least, freeing your currently flattened lips. You sat up rubbing your face as it popped back to normal, when suddenly you saw a shadow fall over you. Glancing up you saw a stern looking Nun frowning down at you. "um...hello" You said blushing bright red and instantly tried to cover up. "Young lady how dare you be indecent on school grounds!" She said, before you could respond she had you up by the ear and was tugging you along towards the building "ow, ow, ow..please ow...stop ow" you said as you stumbled along after her.

As she walked you inside and down the corridors she scolded you "Attempting to run away is a very bad thing young lady, you will need to be punished!" You realised with cold dread that she thought you were a student here. Glancing around you saw a plaque on the wall that read "St Joans School for wayward girls and orphans" It was a foster school! "wait, im not.." you tried to protest but another tug to your ear turned your protest to a yelp of pain.

Before you knew what was happening, the nun had found you a uniform, underwear and all, and you stood dressed like a junior first year catholic school girl, blushing bright red as she took your picture for your "file". Of course you had no file, but the nun just frowned "Trying to run on your first week here. we will have to keep an eye on you wont we. what is your name" She demanded, you blushed "my name is Jill Harper but im not..." You trailed off as you saw her start up a new file saying you were Jill Harper, a new junior student. She was officially putting you in the system. "No im not a student. im not a little gir!" You protested quickly, to which she just smirked and raised an eyebrow "of course your not. i bet your a high class lawyer" she mocked before finishing up your file.

You were now officially in the system as a student and with a quickly printed and laminated student id that was clipped to your little blazer jacket, everyone would know it. "Well as you tried to wander off, you have missed breakfast. so ill take you straight to class" She said, forcing you to walk with her, holding your hand tightly. This was such an embarrising nightmare, you hoped you could get a phone call to someone who would help you soon...

Your mother sideways glanced at you in Sam's hands, much more concerned about why her husband was missing instead of some silly doll. Her eyes barely glanced over you, seeing nothing out of the ordinary from the frilly, stupid little doll. Never once did Mary consider that the doll her niece was holding her own precious daughter.

“What a cute dolly, take good care of it.” Mary smiled at Sam, but anyone over the age of ten would have tasted the sarcasm from that smile. Your mom immediately turned her attention back to her phone, and you felt your hopes and dreams shatter into a million pieces. You had hoped your mom would be the one to save you from your fate, but it turned out you were going to be Sam's doll for a while longer.

“I'm going to keep hanging out with the twins.” Patty told your mom, and she waved her off without a word. Patty grinned deviously while walking away, barely stopping herself from busting out into laughter. Her plan was going perfectly so far, and she was having a blast. The twins followed happily after her, playfully squeezing you and twirling your hair.

“Hey Jilly?” Sam said after a few minutes, looking down at you. “What is your favorite ride at the fair?” You looked up at her with the most disgusted look you could show with your plastered smile. Did she really think you could talk with a frozen mouth? It turned out, that she did.

“Jilly. Answer Sam.” Lucy demanded, showing a bit of anger. You started to worry, and wiped your mean look off in replace with an apologetic voice. You tried to convey that you couldn't talk to answer her question, but Sam didn't understand.

“Stupid Jilly! Answer me!” Sam started yelling at you, droplets of her spit splashing onto your face. Up ahead a few feet, Patty turned around and gave the twins a look. That look changed to fear and surprise as Sam gripped you tightly in anger and tossed you as far as she possibly could.

Your tiny doll form flew through the air, with you mentally screaming along the entire time. The world was rushing around in circles, until everything came to a stop as your body crashed down onto a hard steel beam. Before you had a second to react, a force like a stampede of elephants crushed your body to smithereens, flattening you up into a gooey ball, dress and all.

You had landed on the tracks of a kiddie ride that was near the twins, and the car had rolled right over you. Unfortunately, your squishy body had jammed up into the gears of the car, and the ride had ground to a halt. The kids were all taken out of the ride by the employees, and the ride was closed down for mechanical problems. The employees called for a mechanic.

To make matters worse, neither Sam, Lucy, or Patty had seen where you had landed. Sam had thrown you quite hard and fast for a girl as young as her. Patty heard the commotion of the kiddie ride breaking down, but didn't connect the dots to you. After a minute of pondering, she figured you would be okay somehow. You always were. She dragged Sam and Lucy off, with the two girls in tears.

Everything was pitch black wedged up inside of the car, and you had no idea what was actually going on. You could do nothing but stay there for about ten minutes, but eventually you heard footsteps and a gruff female voice. You felt some heat on your body, and assumed it was from the mechanic's flashlight passing over you.

“It's some kind of gunk.” The mechanic called to the ride employees. You barely heard her muffled voice, but you knew she was referring to you. A second later a gloved hand wrapped around you and roughly pulled you out of the car, dragging your body through gears and other various metal parts. Several sections of your body got caught and were ripped free, sending intense ripples of pain across your body.

You were finally out in the daylight again, although nearly a third of you was left in the car. It would take hours and hours to reform now. To make matters worse, your clothes had been ripped off, you looked simply like disgusting putty, and you were covered in smelly oil. The mechanic grimaced as she looked at you. Your fate depended on what she decided to do with you, so what does she do?

As she drops the lid on you, you realise how full the trash can really is as your crushed down against the rest of the garbage, the twin sounds of locks being clicked on either side of the lid signalling that you won't be getting out of here any time soon.

So tightly packed, you have no hope of reforming as the juices of all the trash seep into you, making you mentally gag as you are surrounded and drowning in the stink of it all. You can hear the muffled screams of people enjoying the rides but you have no hope of rejoining them, hidden away in this bin. You hoped Patty or someone would come find you but as time passed, you began to feel it was less likely even Patty knew where you ended up.

Casually you wondered if your dad had managed to peel himself off from Pattys panties yet and if he was busy telling her off, though it was mostly just to pass the time in your prison. Eventually the sounds of the park went quiet as it shut for the day and then your prison rumbled as someone dragged it along to where all the trash went.

The clips were undone and the lid pulled off, you stretched between it and the junk like a wad of gum before snapping off the lid and landing back in the bin just before it was tipped into a compactor. Binload after binload was poured ontop of you before the terrifying whirr of the pistons signalled they had started the compactor up. Crushed tighter and tighter into the cube of garbage, you had never felt so crushed in your life, pinned on all sides by tons of garbage you were not going to reform until you were free.

Your heart sinks as Lucy and Sam return to the room, "Hey girls," Patty greeted. "Your favorite doll is all ready for playtime."

Lucy and Sam stood there one of them holding a yellow gown that made you sick, in this state, there was nothing to stop them from treating you exactly like a real doll. In fact, they'd probably forget you were their cousin and just put you away at the end of playtime like any other toy. "No," one of them finally said.

It was like your whole world brightened when you heard that, Patty, on the other hand, looked like summer vacation was canceled, "no?" Patty repeated.

"Jilly's not our dolly," the other twin who was holding the gown spoke.

"She is our cousin," her twin added.

Never, had you ever thought you would be looking at the twins as though they were your saviors. "B-but," Patty stammered, "you two love playing with Jill like she's your doll."

"Not anymore," the gown twin said, "me and Lucy got hurt by some bigger kids."

"They push us around," Lucy added, "and said we were so small we were just toys to them."

"That was when Lucy and me realized that we always did that to Jilly," Sam explained.

You felt sorry the twins had to go through that but glad they'd learned a lesson. "But," Patty struggled, "you said you had an outfit for her."

"We just thought she'd look pretty in it," Sam clarified as she held out the dress, now that you could see it you noticed it was a lot less frilly and babyish than what the girls would usually put you. The dress was modeled after Belle's ball gown from Beauty in the Beast, and you knew the girls loved that movie, in fact, they'd often argue over that dress.

"We wanted to invite her to our tea party," Lucy added.

"And thought maybe she could play with us after," Sam paused nervously before adding, "if she wanted to."

"Now make Jilly move," Lucy demanded, "or we'll call your mommy!"

"We have her on speed dial," Sam added.
