“I think Jilly should be the queen!” Sam added.

“I agree,” Lucy smiled.

You laughed too, in the twins fantasy world the queen was usually the boss of the rest of the girls (the princesses), and often the girls always picked Patty to be the queen. “Oh girls, you want me to be the queen?” You asked grinning over to Patty. “Well, in that case,” you were now once again using your bad Brittish accent, “let us go, Princess Sam and Princess Lucy, you may prepare the royal tea as your queen makes herself ready.”

“Yes, Queen Jilly,” the girls recited.

“Let me carry you, Queen Jilly,” Sam offered.

“Of course, Princess Sam,” you announced as Sam and Lucy took you to their room.
1431.title: Queen Jilly

choices: No one buys you, you are in the toy store for a long time.
Your cousins come in at the weekend to buy a new doll, will they recognise you?
After a few weeks, Patty lets slip what she did, will Mary find you in time?
14312.content:
You had a wonderful day with your cousins, it was a happy change to be treated with love and respect rather than be squished and stretched and fought over like a toy. You all enjoyed the tea party, with Patty glaring at you when the girls werent looking, you sat and watched a couple of Disney films with them and ate lunch together, still dressed as Queen Jill and putting on a terrible english accent. Eventually however, all good things come to an end. Your Uncle Gary came home and it was time to leave so he could make dinner for the girls. You looked around for your clothes, Patty pat her bag "Dont worry, i have them, it'll be easier to just change at home" She said. After a long day, you were too tired to argue so you hugged the girls, thanked them for a lovely day and followed your sister outside.

Heading home with Patty, you were surprised by her quietness. You looked out the window of her car and frowned "Um..Patty, this isnt the way home" You said concerned, you turned to Patty who smirked staring ahead. "Its the way to your new home" She said. Before you could respond, she shot one of her arms out towards you. Too late did you noticed the spray bottle of Beta4 she had used on you earlier. "Pat..." Was all you managed to say before your body tensed up rigid in the passenger seat. Patty drove for a few more minutes before parking. She took off her seatbelt and picked you up, positioning your face to look less horrified and more smiling pleasantly. She curled your hair and sprayed it with more Beta4 to make sure it stayed in dollish ringlets before grinning sadistically at you. "You like being Queen Jilly the doll girl, then as a good sister, i'll help you be Queen"

She got out the car with you slung under her arm. Though the world was sideways, you saw where she was heading. "Second hand smiles" it was a second hand toy shop, the window filled to the brim with dolls of all shapes and sizes. You knew it well, Kara from school had locked you in a display case in there a few times, but at least then you had been wearing normal clothes and could move. Patty went in and up to the counter with a smile. "Hi there" She said to the woman who stood behind the counter. "Good day Miss, how can I help you today" The lady asked sweetly. Patty gently stood you up on the counter, facing the woman. "I have this old doll, I havent wanted her for years. Can you find her a new home?" She asked, her tone sounding like butter wouldnt melt in her mouth.

The woman picked you up and smiled "Oh shes so cute. Yes I am sure we can find her a new home, a beautiful little doll like this" You desperatly wanted to tell this woman that you werent a doll, but all you could do was smile as she stroked your poofy dress and cheeks. Patty grinned "Thats wonderful." She pat your head "By Jill, hope you have a lifetime of playtimes" She said mockingly before leaving you with the woman. She smiled at you and laid you down, getting a price tag and looping it around your wrist. "Such a cute little doll. You wont be here long" She said, mostly to herself.

It wasn't long before you were sat on display amongst dozens of other dolls your size. You blended in perfectly, unmoving, smiling, curly ringlets and a big puffy dress, no one would suspect this smiling little doll was really a girl silently screaming for someone to rescue her. About an hour later, it was closing time. The woman turned off the lights and locked up, leaving you alone, staring across the shop at the counter. How could your sister be so evil, how could she leave her own sister trapped like a doll in a toy shop. You prayed someone you knew would find you, though in your current outfit, makeup and hairstyle, you didn't exactly look like yourself and only your little cousins played with dolls...
14312.title: Skip to going home with Patty

choices: "to tidy all your dolls away"
"to give Jill the solvent to let her move"
"to put Jill in my bag to take home"
144.content:
you stare up seeing your cousins from floor height as they look down at you confused "Patty, why is Jilly lying all still?" Sam asked sweetly poking you with a finger. Patty grinned "oh well, she knows how much you girls love to play dollies with her and shes always so shy about dressing up, she got me to spray her with this" she said showing them the bottle "it turned her into a real life dolly for you girls to play with. enjoy girls" both their eyes lit up, they bought the story hook, line and sinker. but then, they were ten, loved dolls and had just been told they could use you like a doll, they wern't going to question it." Sam and Lucy picked you up with excited squeals and your clothes were practically torn off.

you didn't have long to feel exposed all naked before they were slipping you into a poofy shiny satin blue dress with a load of lace, frills, petticoats and rows on it. you could see Patty covering her mouth trying not to burst out laughing. "don't worry Jilly, your our dolly now, we will take good care of you." Lucy pushed the corners of your mouth with her fingers to make you smile, the chemicals fused into you forcing you to keep smiling as if you were happy about any of this. "ok girls, go play with your new dolly" Patty said, shooing them off to their room. Sam held you with one hand as they ran like gazelle up the stairs.

once in their room you were placed down at the tea party table, they posed you to hold a cup with a flower on it and gathered the other dolls to sit around you. it was humiliating how perfectly you blended in. if they tossed you in their toy box, even your mother probably wouldn't spot you at first glance. that was your day, tea parties, being dressed up like bo peep, a bride, a ballerina, a baby, a school girl, a horse rider, a princess. anything and everything that fit you, they dressed you in. at lunch they took you down to the table with them, sitting you in a high chair dressed like a baby, much to Pattys joy and amusement. though of course no one fed the immobile doll girl. you just watched them eat feeling totally ridiculous.

the rest of the day dragged on the same as the morning, the most humiliating part was when they pretended you had pooped your daiper and changed your fake daiper. you were going to get Patty back for this. finally though Patty came into the room and said "ok girls, your dads on his way home time...
144.title: the girls see their new doll and dress her up h...

choices: Your taken out and played with next morning
The girls forget your in there and find new toys
Your mother found out what patty did and comes to find you
1441.content:
Patty smiled at your cousins "so it's time to tidy away your toys" she said cheerfully, "finally" you thought, "this nightmare of a day is over" you were so going to give patty an earful when she sprayed you with the solvent.

"Um but what about Jilly?" Asked Sam holding you up in your current baby girl outfit, then you saw party's smirk "well she's your doll isn't she?" She said with a soft chuckle, Sam shifted a bit "um...yes?" She replied unsure what the right answer was because the day was over. Patty grinned "well then tidy her away with the rest of your toys. She's yours until you don't want her anymore ok!"

You couldn't believe it, surely patty was just messing with you, she couldn't leave you in your cousins care like this! But the girls cheers deafened you as they ran you upto their room, dropping you into their large toy chest. You landed amongst teddy bears and dolls, staring out at the room above you helplessly. Bit by bit the girls rained down toys ontop of you as they tidied away, accidentally burying you from sight.

Your faint sliver of light vanished with a loud wooden thud as they closed the lid and you heard a muffled "there all tidy" from Lucy. Then there was silence, obviously they had left the room. It looked like you were being treated like just another of their many toys.

After hours of silence you hear your uncle Gary reading them a bedtime story and you slowly drift off to sleep yourself, patty would pay for this...eventually...
1441.title: "to tidy all your dolls away"

choices: "Be a better doll next time Jilly." (Your mom realizes that it is you!)
"Stupid doll! Stupid doll!" (Your mom doesn't realize, and she goes back home.)
14413.content:
For the entire night, you remained trapped in Lucy and Sam’s toy box, stuck in the darkness and surrounded by all of their other toys. For twelve straight hours you were stuck in the box, with no possible way to escape. You were completely frozen by the chemical Patty had poured on you, and you had no way to move, talk, or do anything at all. All you could do was sit there, with that stupid smile plastered on your face, and wait.

Finally, morning rolled around, but you weren’t sure if that was a good thing or a bad thing. You heard muffled sounds from outside the toy box, and then the lid was opened. You stared up in a new sense of horror at the smiling faces of Lucy and Sam. They reached into the box and pulled you out.

“Hello little Jill dolly!” Lucy smiled, holding you in her hands.

“Did you sleep well little Jilly?” Sam wondered, poking at your smiling face. The girls dropped you onto the floor, and pulled out several other dolls from their toy box. Soon, you were surrounded by eight other one foot tall girl dolls just like you.

Lucy began to set up a little table for a tea party, while Sam grabbed you and tore off all of your clothes. Just then, and to everyone’s surprise, your mom burst into the room.

The previous night, Patty, in a surprising nice act on her part, let slip to your mom what had happened to you. She told your mom that she had left you as a doll for Lucy and Sam to play with, and your mom had been immediately alarmed. However, it was much too late for her to rescue you that night, so she had waited for morning. Now, she was here to save you.

Your eyes lit up upon seeing your mom, as you realized that she was here to save you. However, Sam continued to play with you, as she had no reason to worry about your mom. She had no idea what she was doing was wrong. She pulled over out a little toy potty from her toy box, and placed you on top of it. She began to push down on your chest, pretending that you were pooping.

Meanwhile, your mom said hello to the girls and began to examine each of their dolls. There were nearly a hundred dolls spread around throughout the room, so it was a long process for her. Your heart dropped as you saw that she hadn’t noticed you immediately.

Sam, satisfied that you had used the bathroom, removed you from the potty, and dressed you in only a diaper. You were completely naked except for the diaper, and you were mortified and embarrassed. Sam poked at your breasts, wondering what the strange things on your chest were. Each of her flicks were incredibly painful, and you mentally screamed.

Lucy had finished setting up the table, and so Sam dropped you into an empty seat. She held up a little cup filled with a small amount of tea, and tried to make you drink it. However, you couldn’t open your mouth in your frozen state, and Sam became agitated. She tried to force you to drink the tea, and resulted in the tea spilling all over your face.

The hot and brown liquid burned your face, and you silently cried out in agony. The tea soaked your skin, and dyed your face and upper body a dark brown. As all of this went on, your mom was continuing to search the room for her daughter, not knowing that you were so close the entire time.

Lucy grabbed you from Sam, and smacked you on the face in anger. She threw you on the ground, and sat on you roughly, squishing you underneath her tiny butt. When she stood up, your face had been slightly squished in, causing an indentation in the side of your face.

Sam and Lucy proceeded to step on you several times, angry that you hadn’t drunk the tea like they had wanted. Their tiny feet slammed into you over and over, causing pain to shoot up all over your body. Your body bent in, squashed, in several places, and your cheery smiled was mashed into a crooked grin. Dirt and sweat from the girls feet rubbed off onto your body, caking you in flecks of brown and giving your body a disgusting sweaty sheen.

Finally, your mom had finished checking every single doll in the room except for you. She asked for you politely, and Sam kicked you over to your mom in a huff. Your battered body bounced over to your mom, who picked you up off of the floor.

She felt the dirt and sweat covering your body, and she grimaced in disgust. Still, she had to make sure that you weren’t her daughter in disguise.

She raised you to eye level, and she peered at you closely. You stared back at her, feeling hope rise in your chest. You knew that there was no way that your own mom wouldn’t recognize you. You were saved.

Unfortunately, you didn’t look anything like the daughter your mom knew and loved. With your brown dyed head, your disturbing crooked smile, the dirt and the sweat, and the various indents and squashed parts on your body, you looked simply like a broken and mistreated doll. With a sigh, your mom handed you back to Sam and Lucy.

Your heart shattered into a thousand pieces as your mom handed you back, and you realized that it was hopeless. You would spend the rest of your life as the plaything to these two little girls, never to live a normal life again.

Lucy grabbed your from your mom, and began flicking you in the face repeatedly. Your mom turned to walk out of the room, when suddenly Lucy spoke. What does Lucy say?
14413.title: A Difficult Rescue

choices: She plans to take you home at the end of the day
She wants to help the girls disguise you more
144132.content:
Lucy angrilly scolds you for not being a good toy "Stupid doll! Stupid doll!" she said shaking you angrilly, while all you can do is watch the vibrating image of your mother leave the room with your two cousins. Annoyed at you they toss you aside letting you skid across their floor and stop near the bed, you watch the door shut as your only hope leaves and the girls get on with their tea party with the other dolls. You couldn't believe your sister had gotten you into this mess, nor could you belive your cousins could have made you so unreconisable that your own mother hadn't realised it was you when she held you. You began to wonder if this was your life now, without your mother rescuing you it seemed unlikely Patty would come to your aid and your Cousins were too doll obsessed to really question why their cousin who they often treated like a doll was now their doll full time and didn't move. 



after a couple of hours of lying on your side staring at the door and listening to your cousins play, the damage they had done to you had popped back out to normal, other than the stained skin that would need a scrub to clean, you looked like yourself again, sadly it was too little too late. All of a sudden Sam reached down and grabbed you, picking you up. "Maybe we were too angry at Jill Doll, the other dollies can't drink, maybe she can't either when shes a doll" the little girl thought out loud, she gave you a tight hug "Sorry Jilly Doll, we wont be angry again" and with that you were reluctantly brought back to the other dolls. You just wanted your cousins to give you to your mother, but it looked like you had nothing but playtimes ahead of you for the forseeable future. After being scrubbed with a baby wipe and dressed in a big poofy diaper and a satin pink poofy dress you were sat down and forced to play tea party again as "princess babypants" 



Lucy forced a big pink pacifier into your smiling mouth, which moved to hold the pose of the new object though sadly you had no movement to push it back out and tied your hair up into pig tails with big pink bows in. "you know, Jill isnt a very good doll name, its not pretty enough" Lucy said to her sister as she did your hair. Sam looked over and then looked thoughtful "Well shes our dolly now so we can rename her...how about um...Goldilocks?" Lucy giggled "hehe thats a silly name, but ok Goldilocks. hello Goldilocks, do you like your new name?" she asked then made you bounce and did a funny squeaky voice "oh i love it, its the prettiest name ever" she made you pretend to say, clearly they wern't going to be calling you Jill anymore, which made an adult overhearing them playing with you so much harder. 



finally the long painful day of playtime was over, with you expecting to be put away in the toy box, except this time Sam picked you up and carried you to bed with her, cuddling you as your uncle read them a bedtime story without giving you a second glance. This was torture, but all you could do was look cute and keep your pacifier in as she cuddled you falling asleep. 



That was your life for a while, they played with you equal amount as they played with their other dolls. You sat staring at nothing for many hours on end when they were at school and were dressed in many poofy outfits during playtimes, they even took you to school on show and tell day, though the teacher thought nothing of them telling the class the doll was their auntie who was their doll. She assumed it was little girls imaginations at work. 



One evening you heard the door downstairs open and heard your uncles voice faintly over the sound of your cousins latest game, goldilocks peep has lost her sheep, with you as a pink sheperdess doll chasing down her sheep toys. "hi patty, thanks for agreeing to babysit" Your sister was here, to babysit your cousins. Was she going to free you from this nightmare? Or was she really going to leave you like this?
144132.title: "Stupid doll! Stupid doll!" (Your mom d...

choices: Something happens to you the very next day.
Several days pass until something happens.
Several weeks pass, and you are packed up in a box.
1443.content:
“I’m sorry girls, but it’s time for me to go home. I need to take Jill home with me too.” Patty explained to the girls. They sighed in sadness, and handed you to Patty. Patty grabbed you from them and dropped you into her purse. She waved goodbye to the girls, and then left the house as Gary entered.

Patty walked out to her car and got inside. Before leaving, she pulled you out of her purse. She smirked down at you in her hands.

“Oh Jill.” Patty teased. “You look simply adorable like that. However, I think you could look a little better.” Patty pulled a make-up case out of her purse with a devilish grin. You had absolutely no idea what she was going to do to you.

Patty observed you closely. You had been placed back into the blue satin dress, and your face was still frozen in a smile from what the girl’s had done to you earlier. Patty immediately realized what exactly she was going to do to you.

She dabbed a little bit of lipstick onto your lips, dying them a bright red. She also carefully applies eyeliner and eye shadow to your eyes, making you look gorgeous. Lastly, she added a dark touch of foundation to your face and hands, changing your natural pale complexion to a deep tan. When Patty was finished, you looked nothing like your normal self.

Satisfied, Patty placed you back inside of her purse, and drove home. Once home, she retrieved you once more from her purse, and carried you through the front door.

“Mom! I’m home!” Patty called out. Within seconds, your mom walked into the room. Right before she did though, Patty held you behind her back, and out of sight from your mom.

“Hello Patty.” Your mom smiled. “How was babysitting?”

“It was great. The girls are just the cutest. Jill and I had a lot of fun.”

“Speaking of, where is Jill?” Your mom wondered.

“Actually, Jill decided to stay over at their house for a while, maybe even a couple weeks.”

“Really?”

“Yeah. Honestly, I can’t blame her. The girls are just so cute!”

“But school is still going on, right?”

“Yeah. Uncle Gary is going to drive her to school each morning. He’s cool about it.”

“Oh. Okay then!” Your mom nodded. You couldn’t believe that she had fallen for Patty’s lie. You hated how good of a liar your sister was. People always believed everything she said.

“Guess what mom? On the way home, I bought something for you!” Patty grinned from ear to ear, her grip on you tightening.

“What is it dear?” Your mom inquired, confused.

“This!” Patty pulled you out from behind her back, and held you out for your mom to see. She held you upright by your shoulders, so your mom could see every inch of you.

“Oh my god! Patty!” Your mom exclaimed. You hoped she was exclaimed because she recognized you, but then you realized what Patty’s master plan was with a shattering thought. Your mom loved to collect dolls!

How could you have forgotten? Your mom was obsessed about dolls, and she displayed them all in the living room. She had over thirty different dolls. The girls had dressed you up, Patty disguised you with makeup, and now your mom was about to accept you as a gift!

Your mom grabbed you from Patty, and held you in her hands. She flipped you over and over, admiring every detail of your body. She felt your hands and face, loving the smooth texture you were “made” with. The chemical had hardened your body so you felt like a normal plastic doll to her. She stared closely at your face, soaking in every detail. Unfortunately, she did not recognize you underneath the layers of make-up.

You had hoped she would recognize you, but you knew how her love of dolls clouded her mind sometimes. Once, years ago, Patty had used the same chemical and turned you into a doll. She had given you to your mom as a gift, and she had graciously accepted you. You were stuck on the shelf as a display for over two weeks before you were rescued, but not by your mom, but by your dad. However, your mom appeared to have forgotten about that incident completely.

“Patty!” Your mom embraced Patty in a big hug. “This is wonderful! I love her! This is one of the cutest dolls I have ever seen!”

“I’m glad you like it!” Patty smiled back, and then walked up to her room. Your mom immediately placed you on the shelf, sliding a few other dolls over. She took a step back, admired how you looked on the shelf, and then left the room.

You were in a terrible position and you knew it. As much as you didn’t want to repeat the past, it appeared to be heading that way. However, this time, your dad might not even recognize you with all the make-up Patty had applied. You might be
stuck on the shelf for even longer!

How long do you remain as a display on the shelf?
1443.title: Your Mom's Hobby

choices: she says nothing, your stored with the dolls for a long time
she finally comes clean (or makes an excuse to keep you out)
14433.content:
Your fears prove to be true, as when your Dad comes home, your Mother gushes over her cute new doll to him. However she fails to mention it was from Patty so he doesn't even look at you suspiciously, he simply says "its very cute" giving you a glance and then relaxing after his day at the factory. Your happy doll face was smiling pleasantly but inside you were screaming in frustration at your sisters clever evilness and your own terrible luck.

You figured after a while someone would recognise you, but the most notice you got was from Patty, smirking at you between flicking channels over the first few days, but even that stopped when she got bored of taunting you with no visible reaction. Your Mother dusted over you daily, that and your new dolly sisters as she called them. she had given you the doll name Prisilla, and she fussily made sure every bit of you was perfect like all the others. The days were nothing but boredom and frustration as you stared immobile at the couch and your family moving about their day.

Days turned into weeks and then even months, your parents were worried about your absense when your uncle confessed he hadnt seen you in ages. however, thanks to Patty managing to convince some girls at school to tell teachers you were around for about a week after she dollified you, they assumed you had gone missing after "Prisilla" joined the family. Your parents knew you would turn up sooner or later, once they had lost your father for a full 8 months when he had slipped and fallen unseen into his machinery and ended up as a luxury insole, thankfully Beta4 free, so he wasnt trapped other than being nearly constantly underfoot for some overworked secratary.

Though worried, they kept their hopes up and went about their lives, unaware their daughter was hidden in plain sight. One morning you were filled with dread as you saw your Mother enter the living room with a large trunk from the attic. You knew that trunk, it was where most of your Mothers dolls lived. She had so many collected over the years that she alternated the ones on display,otherwise they would fill the house. Most were kept in storage in the trunk, tucked away in the attic. Some you hadn't seen since you were four years old, every few months she swapped the dolls round and it looked like it was your turn.

You watched in silent, immobile fear as she put the replacements sitting on the couch, and gently wrapped Abigail the doll up and tucked her gently in the trunk on a pile of other carefully stored dolls, then Serenity the angel doll was tucked next to her, soon after followed Esmarelda the Ballerina doll and then it was your turn. Your Mothers hand gently wrapped around your waist and lifted you up, dusting you off and getting ready to store you like the others as Patty walked in with a can of soda. Patty blinked seeing Mom about to store you away in the attic trunk...
14433.title: Several weeks pass, and you are packed up in a ...

choices: ...Her doll sewing kit (Modelling Doll)
...a bottle of Solvent (Freedom!)
...a bottle of solvent and a little plastic pot (Gummy Toy)
144332.content:
Just as your mom is lowering your (immobile, silently screaming) form into your storage place next to your fellow dolls, Patty's voice breaks in and causes her to pause:

"Hey Mom, wait a second." Your heart leaps as your mom pauses and straightens up, giving you a reprieve from your fate. Is Patty finally going to come clean and let her know that the doll she was about to seal away for (potentially) years is in fact her own lost daughter? Your hopes are immediately dashed:

"If you were just going to put Priscila away in storage, could you let me borrower her instead?" Seeing your mom's doubtful expression, she quickly added: "It's just, you took away Alice the other day, but I was still working on a few projects, so I was hoping I could get a new model." Your mom’s small frown was wiped away instantly, replaced with a slightly guilty expression quickly covered by a nervous smile, and her hand squeezed you rapidly in an unconscious nervous gesture:

“Oh, I’m sorry; I didn’t realize you were still working on something. Of course you can have Priscila, I was actually thinking of putting out Alice anyway in her spot, so this should be fine. I’ll be sure to ask you next time before taking your model.” Patty really was a master at playing your mother like a fiddle- even Mom might get suspicious at a tantrum, sulk or demand (although those often worked as well, to your detriment), but by pretending to be put out but dealing with it maturely when mom denied her something, Patty would almost always get what she wanted. And usually (as now), what she wanted was you.

“Thanks Mom! I’ve got a few projects for Lucy and Sam in particular that I should be able to do now.” Patty said brightly as she took your stiff, elegantly dressed form and clasped it in her free hand against her chest (to your extreme discomfort). She smiled brightly at your mom, her smile turning into a smug, satisfied grin as she turned her back on mom and looked down at you. She didn’t say anything, however, given your mom was still nearby, finishing up her packing and starting to set out the new dolls.

Your face remained, as ever, stiff and frozen in a dumb-happy smile, but inwardly you seethed as Patty headed for the stairs and her room (giving you a quick jolt of terror as she held you over the wastebasket in the hall, but she was only chugging her soda and dropping in the empty can, her grip on you remained secure, vice-like). You supposed it was better than being locked away in the attic in the dark, but it looked like you’d traded being a pretty ornament for the family in the living room for being Patty’s personal model or toy.

Patty did in fact sometimes make clothes (or other accessories) as gifts for your doll-crazed mom and cousins, and her friends, something which had started after her first home-economics class in Elementary school. Her favorite model (as well as favorite wad of gum, insole, clothing logo, temporary tattoo, tissue, wash-rag and, once (disgustingly) tampon) was of course you. It had been harder for her at first, given how much you hated the activity and how difficult it was to stop your squirming even with her overwhelming size. That had changed, of course, after your first month as a beta4 doll, during which time Patty frequently persuaded mom that you might as well serve as her model.

After that, it had become fairly frequent, all Patty needed was a little squirt of beta4 and you were the perfect rigid, posable model that would remain in place while your sister cut, sewed, glued and marked (or if her attention wandered), and if you somehow ended up in a drawer or on a shelf rather than back in your room freed, well, your mom didn’t even know Patty had beta4 and dint’ suspect a thing. Of course, you usually (often no longer than a few hours) because Mom weren’t stuck for too long because your parents knew Patty had you and Patty was careful not to draw their attention to her little spray bottle by having them wonder where you were.

There was, however, one memorable and unpleasant couple of weeks you spent frozen and utterly bored in your sister’s Elementary school desk with her sewing kit, cloth and scissors while your parents were away on a business trip. You’d been terrified someone might steal your sister’s “pretty doll” from her desk, but thankfully the only bad thing that had happened was your sister removing all your clothes and adding you to the classes common store of naked dolls for the exercise a few times, but she’d always retrieved you at the end of the day, after you’d been humiliated and naked under the gaze of just about everyone in the class. You’d helped her earn an A that quarter in Home Ec (not the first A you’d helped her with).

Your involuntary modeling sessions (as well as Patty’s doll-clothes making enthusiasm) had petered out a few years ago when you’d gone through a growth spurt. When you’d been younger and (even) smaller, it had been harder for Mom to resist letting Patty use you as a model (supposedly willingly), because you were such a good fit for rarer, smaller and more-specialized dolls, especially doll children. After you had grown to a more standard height for a doll, your mom had finally seen sense and insisted that Patty should just use a regular standard doll.

Only now that “regular standard doll” was you, and it looked like your Mom wouldn’t be rescuing you this time. Given how guilty Patty had made her for taking Alice, there was no way your mom would take away “Priscila” without Patty’s permission.

You still held out a little hope that Patty had just used the excuse and was going to free you now, after your several months of torment. She hadn’t been very productive lately with her clothes-making and might have lost her appetite for it. The more cynical, realistic part of you pointed out that her lack of enthusiasm was likely due to her lack of her favorite model, which she now had absolute (and unsuspected) possession of. Your field of view spun by crazily as Patty held you loosely and confidently in her hand by her waist, swinging her arm as she climbed the stairs up towards her room.

Entering her room, patty closed the door and sat down, placing you front and center on her desk before her. She grinned evilly down at you but didn’t say anything, and then her eyes lost focus and she gazed off into the distance for a few moments, clearly trying to figure out what to do, fingers drumming annoyingly nearby your small form.

You wanted to glare daggers at her and demand to be freed, or scream at her about the last few months of dollified boredom, or beg, but of course you remained gazing with a fixed smile, totally helpless before her giant, non-doll whims. Finally, she grabbed you and lifted you to her face.

Quickly and efficiently, Patty stripped you to the skin. She had long practice from her many doll modelling sessions- Mom never noticed your own torn and shredded clothes from Patty’s normal play sessions, but heaven help either of you if a single seam was damaged in her precious doll collection. With you naked in her hand, she smirked again and seemed to come to a decision. Reaching up, she felt around on one of her upper shelves over her desk, trying to find something that had been pushed back out of sight. Finally, she brought down…

That was your life for months as Patty made dozens of outfits for your mothers dolls, your cousins dolls and her friends. No one but her knew your real identity. 1443321.title: ...Her doll sewing kit (Modelling Doll)

choices: Your mother, Mary!
The saleswoman, Elizabeth!
A complete stranger!
145.content:
Sam and Lucy thunder into view, until they are finally standing mere inches from your body. They haven’t noticed you yet, and are staring at Patty, who begins to talk to the two of them.

“Hey girls!” Patty exclaims. “I have a special mission for the two of you today.”

“What is it Patty?” The twins cry in unison.

“I brought this old doll from my house today, and I was wondering if you had a spare doll box, so that I could return the doll to the store.” Patty points to the floor, and the two girls look down at you.

“That dolly looks like Jill!” Sam noted.

“It does, but it isn’t.” Patty assured her. “It’s just a stupid little doll.”

“I’ll got get a box Patty!” Lucy added, and she ran upstairs to go get an empty box. Sam followed her to help her. When they were out of sight, Patty bent down and whispered to you.

“Let’s see you survive this one little Jill doll.” She snickered. You could do nothing but stare at her as the spray had completely frozen you. In this state, you would even feel like a doll. To add insult to injury, Patty shifts your look of terror into a pleasant smile, and your face freezes that way.

A minute later, the twins return, and they set the box down. It is a box just long enough to fit you, but also incredibly narrow and tight from the right and left and the top. Sam picks you up and stuffs you into the box, positioning you so that you are staring out at the three giantesses. Lucy closes the lid of the box, which is partially see-through, allowing you to see out and people to look in and see you. Patty tapes the box shut, sealing you in, and then sets you upright on the table.

“Awesome job girls! Now who wants a cookie?” Patty smiles.

“We do! We do!” The girls cheer, and the three of them run off into the kitchen, and disappear from sight.

You couldn’t believe what was happening right now. How could Patty do something like this to you? Sure, she had pulled countless pranks before, but nothing on this level! Surely it was a joke, and she would free you later that day, right?

Five exhausting hours later, and Patty finally reappears. She gathers up her belongings, including you, says goodbye to the girls, and heads out. Instead of walking home, she makes a different turn, and begins to head to the toy store only a few blocks away.

After a few minutes, Patty reaches the toy store, and she walks inside. She sets you down on the counter, and addresses the saleswoman.

“Excuse me ma’am, but I would like to see if you wanted this doll.” Patty lied. “I no longer have need for it, and maybe you might want it.”

“Well of course!” The saleswoman, an eighteen year old girl named Elizabeth, said. “Any donations are welcome!” She peers into your case, and eyes you up. “That certainly is an attractive doll. She’s quite curvy, wouldn’t you say? And that smile is mesmerizing! She’s simply so lifelike.”

“Yep!” Patty admits. “She was always my favorite plaything, but I’m just too old for dolls now.”

“Of course. I understand.” Elizabeth nods. She picks up your box, and puts you under her arm. “Thanks again, and have a good day!” Elizabeth begins walking away with you.

“You have a good day too!” Patty calls as she turns to leave. You catch her eye one last time before she leaves, and she waves cheerfully to you. You wished you could break free and strangle her, but you just can’t do anything at all.
Elizabeth sets you down on an empty space surrounding by other dolls, and slaps a ten dollar price tag on the box. Before walking away, she looks at you one last time.

“You…are just such a cute little doll!” She giggles, and then walks out of sight. You want her to notice you are a real person, but the sad truth is that you just don’t look real at all at the current moment. You are confined to staring out of your cage, perpetually staring.

A full day of torture later, and someone finally comes over and picks up your box, ready to but you, but who is it?
145.title: Patty's Worst Prank Yet

choices: Savannah is a playful ten year old girl that you’ve never met.
Savannah is an attractive sixteen year old girl, and one of your best friends!
Savannah is a sultry thirty year old woman, who uses dolls for pleasure.
1453.content:
The hours dragged on and on, and you fell asleep several times. It was just so boring, being trapped in your perfect little doll position, stuck inside a box on a rack in a toy store. You couldn’t move, you couldn’t talk, and you couldn’t even blink. Dust had accumulated in your eyes from you inability to blink, slightly blinding your vision, and stinging you with pain to no end.

When it had just started to seem like your position in life had been sealed, you heard the sound of footsteps. You glanced over as far as your unmoving eyes would allow, and you spotted a woman walking down your aisle. She was working her way closer to you, examining each of the dolls on the shelf closely. Finally, she reached you, and she ran her piercing gaze over you for a full minute. Finally, she smiled.

“Oh! You are just the cutest thing! Savannah will love you!” The woman squealed with delight. She grabbed your box and picked it up off of the shelf, holding it sideways. Your body tilted at an unnatural angle, as your prison was held sideways. You could do nothing but stare at the floor, and the woman’s heels clicking against the hard floor as she walked.

You were terrified beyond belief, as you had no idea who this strange woman was, or what her plans were for you. You had half-hoped that Patty would have told your mom what she did, and that your mom would have rescued you. Sadly, it seemed like that was not to be, as the woman carried you to Elizabeth, the cashier, humming a merry tune.

The woman placed you on the counter, and Elizabeth ran the scanner over the price tag she had slapped onto your earlier. The woman paid Elizabeth in cash, and then Elizabeth slipped you into a plastic bag, handing you back over to the woman. The two giantesses exchanged in brief, pleasant conversation, and then the woman was out the door, taking you with her.

The woman swung the plastic bag holding you back and forth, tossing you in a dizzying manner around your box-shaped prison. When she reached her car, she placed you on the passenger’s seat, and then drove off to her house. The car trip was long and bumpy, causing you to hit your head on the box’s lid several times. It took nearly a half hour to reach the woman’s house, and you knew that you were far, far away from home. You began to mentally cry, and pray that you could just get back home.

Your captor walked inside her house, and placed you on a table. She removed the bag, and then angled your box to face the stairwell leading upstairs. She examined you one more time, smiling.

“I’ve never seen a more realistic doll. And you were so cheap too!” The woman laughed. “Don’t worry little dolly, Savannah will treat you well!” She called up the stairs, yelling for Savannah. She then stood beside the box, and waited. A few moments later, you heard the sound of someone descended the stairs. You braced yourself for the worst, and prepared to meet your new owner.

14532.content:
Your heart was racing like a rabbit who sees a car speeding towards them on the highway, whoever it was coming was going to think your a doll, your life would be nothing but dress up's and tea parties until eventually the girl got to old for you and you were stuffed away in the attic in a box of old toys. No one ever finding out that your a real girl trapped into imobilisation. Suddenly a girl came into view, she was 16 and very pretty. You knew her well, it was Savannah, your classmate who was good friends with you. not best friends like Ana and Kat, but still good friends. You were saved!

You squealed with silent joy as her mother handed you over to her, Savannah taking you and looking at you confused as her mother said "i saw this cute little doll on offer in the store and thought it would be the perfect addition to your doll collection" Savannah was looking you right in the face and you heard her mutter "Jill?" She thanked her mom with a hug and headed back up to her room. You had never been in her room before, it was quite nice, a bookshelf, a few shelves of unique dolls in pretty little outfits, her big bed and a on her drawers.

Savannah tapped you on the cheek a few times with her fingernail, hearing the hard plasticy tapping sound rather than your usual gummy squish "weird. this doll looks just like Jill" she said to herself and your hopeful heart plummeted. Thanks to the Beta4 you felt like plastic to her, of course she wouldn't make the connection that this smiling plastic doll was her schoolfriend, even if it looked just like you. You tried to calm yourself though, all it needed was for her to mention the likeness you shared with...well, yourself at school to Ana and Kat and they would investigate. Of course the major flaw in that plan was Savannah's shyness over her doll collection. She often worried people would think she was childish and didn't talk about it much. But you kept the hope going all the same.

Shrugging to herself, Savannah casually peeled you out of your clothes, dropping you on the bed and saw your naked plasticy body "wow...this doll is really accurate..not a kids toy" she said and you wished you could blush as she looked you over very intimatly. Savannah wasted no time in picking you out a cute frilly little outfit and slipping you into it, weaving your golden locks into dolly ringlets and weaving ribbons in your hair, tying them into floppy bows. you saw her vanish from sight for a few moments before she came back with a paint brush and some doll make up for you. carefully and slowly painting your lips a lovely ruby red to go with your new red satin dress, giving your already long lashes an even darker and richer look. painting on some pink blusher and genurally making you look like a very pretty and even more artificial doll.

Happy with her work she fluffed out your petticoats and sat you down on the shelf between two real dolls. You saw her nod and smile with satisfaction before she sat down on her bed and turned on the TV. On the plus side, the shelves faced the TV so you could at least watch what she watched. You sat there smiling in silence as she went down for dinner and when she finished her homework. You of course couldn't move even when she went to bed and turned off the lights. You really hoped she would mention her new doll to someone tomorrow at school or you were going to be spending a long long time amongst her doll collection...

15.content:
once you finished your breakfast you grinned over at your sister kicking your feet "ok Patty I'm ready" you say cheerfully. Patty raises an eyebrow and looks up from her phone "huh ready for what? to get sat on again?" you made a face at that "no stupid. you promised me we would hang out today. you know somewhere relaxing, like the beach or the park...don't tell me you forgot" you said with a sigh. Patty could be so forgetful with any promises she made. like the time she convinced you to spy on Kara at school and molded you into an insole in Kara's high heel while she was in gym. promising to grab you the very next day and find out the dirt you uncovered on her, instead she totally forgot and you spent the better part of a month going to class under Kara's sole listening to the muffled voice of your teacher before Kara noticed you wern't an insole. she left you knotted around the basketball pole in gym where Patty found you later that day.

"no i didn't forget" Patty protested in a very unconvincing voice "i just need to grab supplies for the day...then we can go. you should get some too squirt" she said heading out of the room. you hopped off your chair and followed her "what kind of stuff to i need? are we going to the park or the beach?" you asked but Patty ignored you heading into her room. grabbing a bag and putting in her bikini and a towel, obviously planning to sunbathe wherever you went. she grabbed her ipod and a book and some snack food she kept in a minifridge in her room. "PATTY" you yelled hating being ignored. your sister however, hated you yelling at her. she turned frowning at you "quit yelling" she said picking you up quickly with a smirk "and if your not going to bother packing.." she began "you haven't told me what to.." you tried to argue but she continued "then im just going to have to pack you" before you could make another word, she crushed you into a ball in her hands, rolling you up tight and smoothing you out. she opened a drawer and grabbed an old favorite toy of hers. it was a see through rubber ball. it was hollow now, its old gel contents having been poured out years ago by your sister. she had converted it to split into two halves but twist shut tight. on more than one occasion you had spent the day as her bouncy ball being thrown around inside that thing.

she unscrewed it, dropping your ballshape snugly into the open half before screwing the other half back on. the world went near silent through the thick rubber. the world slightly blurry for you. you heard Patty muffled voice say "there, now i can ride my bike there without worrying about losing you..maybe i'll even let you out when we get there" she teased and dropped you into the bag with her other things, you quickly rolled to the bottom staring up at the slither of daylight above. Patty continued to toss items into her bag before that slither of light vanished, she zipped the bag shut. then your world lurched as she put the bag on her back and headed out, calling out her farewells to your mother and hopped onto her bike. she set off for her day out with you towards...
15.title: go with your sister to the park/beach

choices: One of the twins decides to use you instead of their own towel.
They both decline, so Patty uses you as her towel.
The twins recognize that it's really you, and they return you to normal.
151.content:
Patty rode her bag at a fast speed, as she was gladly looking forward to arriving at the beach. She loved the beach, and she loved wearing her bikini, and she loved tanning, and she loved swimming. She just about loved everything about the beach. She knew you liked the beach as well, so she often brought you along. However, she wasn’t always nice to you at the beach, and she often tortured you in some way or another. Even today, she had a plan in store for you.

Inside the rubber ball, you could do nothing but wait for Patty to free you. You hated how helpless the ball made you feel. A toy for children was enough to contain your entire self inside of it. You just wished that you would escape from its confinements soon, and be free from Patty’s dark bag.

Patty reached the beach in a record twenty minutes. Usually, it took her over a half hour to bike to the beach, as it was a decent distance from your house. She parked her bike alongside a row of other bikes, and then walked onto the beach proper.

The beach was fairly crowded, but there were still plenty of empty areas around for Patty to find a nice spot. First, she headed to the locker room to change into her bikini. She knew you wanted to be let out as soon as possible, but she figured you could wait a while longer.

She walked into the locker room and opened up her bag. She pulled out her bikini, finally allowing sunlight to flow into your prison. The light was bright, and it burned your eyes from being unused to it, but you still gladly welcomed it. Meanwhile, Patty changed into her skimpy, black, two-piece bikini. Then, when nobody else was around, she pulled you out of her bag, and dumped you out of the ball.

You landed on the bench with a soft splat, still a crushed up mound of flesh. Before you had time to reform, Patty flattened you to the bench with the palm of her hand. Without a second thought, she peeled you off the bench, and held your now papery form in both of her hands. She pulled you taut, stretching your body out to long lengths. When she had finished, you were a long tan shape, otherwise known as a towel!

You were mentally screaming over and over again at Patty to stop. This was supposed to be a fun and relaxing trip to the beach, and she was turning it into a nightmare! Your sister never passed up an opportunity to ruin your life. You wanted to wiggle and squirm out of her grasp, but her hold on you was too strong.

Satisfied at her work, Patty laid you out on one of the benches in the locker room. She took a small blue bottle out of her bag, and you recognized it as being waterproof paint. Your face, which comprised half of one side of the towel, stared up at your sister in terror.

Patty dabbed the brush in the blue paint, and then proceeded to paint every last inch of your body with the paint. The cold and wet pain soaked your skin, instantly covering you in a thin layer of blue. By the time Patty finished, you were blue from head to toe. Not a single part of you looked like normal, and all of your standard human features were absent.

Patty giggled to herself, and waited for five minutes for the paint to dry on your body. Then, she pulled out another towel from her bag, the towel she had originally brought with her to lie on. She shoved her bag in a locker, and then walked out onto the beach with you slung over her shoulder.

Once out on the beach, Patty found a nice empty spot to lie out in the sun. She was just about to prepare to throw you out on the sand, when your best friends Kat and Ana arrived. They had been scheduled to hang out with you and Patty today, so Patty excitedly waved them over to join her.

They were both already wearing their bikinis. Kat was wearing a standard red two-piece bikini, and Ana was wearing a blue one-piece bikini. They had their own small bags with them, and they set them down beside Patty.

“Hey Patty! How’s it going?” Kat asked.

“Pretty good Kat.” Patty replied, a slow smile growing on her face.

“Hey.” Ana said. “Where’s Jill? I don’t see here.”

“Oh. She decide to hang at home today. She’s not feeling too well.” Patty lied, never hesitating a second.

“Alright. Tell her I hope she feels better.” Ana smiled. Patty nodded. The twins began to spread out their own towels when Patty spoke up again.

“Wait. Before you do that…” She held you out for the twins to see. “Would you like to use this towel? It’s super soft. I have an extra towel, so do either of you want it?” The twins examined you closely, rubbing their hands on your body. What happens next?
151.title: Welcome to the Beach

choices: Ana hands you to Patty, and Patty takes you home.
Patty decides to let Ana keep you as her towel.
The girls just leave you lying there on the beach.
1511.content:
Kat and Ana examined you closely, and both of their faces slowly spread into smiles. However, before Kat could even open her mouth, Ana spoke first.

“I want it!” She blurted out, surprising both Kat and Patty. Kat sighed, as she had clearly wanted to use you as well. Patty grinned ever so slightly, more than pleased that her plan had worked out perfectly. “It’s just way too soft and comfortable!”

Patty handed you to Ana, and your best friend grabbed you tightly, enjoying the feeling of your body between her fingers. You couldn’t believe that your own best friends hadn’t recognized you, but you supposed that Patty had hidden your identity rather well. Still, you didn’t want to be used by Ana at all, but there wasn’t much you could do about it.

Ana tossed her other towel aside, and then spread you out across the sand. When you were nice and even, she slowly lowered herself onto you with a smile. She sat on you, her butt coming to a rest right on your crotch. She leaned back, lying on you on her back. Her head slammed down onto your face as she leaned back.

In just a few short seconds, all of Ana’s weight was pressing down onto your body. Her body crushed you flat against the sand of the beach, most certainly keeping you from reforming. Her bikini covered ass painfully grinded against your flattened crotch, and her heavy head covered up your entire face, rubbing hair all over your eyes and mouth.

Ana sighed in contentment, and smiled widely. She rubbed her hands along her new towel as she sat there, feeling the smooth texture of the towel. For some reason, the towel was warmer than a normal towel, and it felt so good on her entire body. Patty was also smiling, watching her friend crush the living daylights out of you.

Ana laid on you for over an hour, before finally climbing to her feet. Her sandy feet trampled over you as she walked away to go swim in the ocean, leaving footprints and sand on your battered body. However, you knew that this was your chance to reform, now that she was gone. You started to focus on reforming, but before you could make any progress, Patty threw Kat and Ana’s beach bags on top of you.

The sudden extra weight pressed down on you, and prevented you from reforming. Your only chance had slipped away, all thanks to your devious sister’s cunning mind. Patty giggled cruelly, and then went back to sleep, continuing to work on her tan.

Three agonizing hours later, Ana once more entered your view. She picked up the beach bags and moved them to the side. She thanked Patty for saving her spot, and then she began to lie down on you, but this time stomach first. Helpless, you could do nothing but accept it.

Ana’s now soaking wet breasts slammed down onto your face, covering up your entire face with her expansive breast flesh. Water from her tits rolled off her bikini and soaked your body. The rest of her body covered you up, with her own crotch pressing down on yours. Ana sighed once more, and drifted off to sleep.

For two painful hours, Ana did nothing but sleep on you, using you as the simple towel she thought you were. Her overbearing weight continued to weigh down on you, leaving marks and indentions in your blue towel body. The water from her body ran off onto you, soaking you in various places. You began to cry, as all you had wanted was to enjoy a simple day at the beach.

Finally, Ana stirred, and you realized she was about to wake up. Ana shook herself awake, and then rose to her knees. She yawned, and stretched out her arms and legs. Then, she stood to her feet, and trampled over you once more, her bare feet stepping down right on her face. Her sweaty and sandy feet left big marks on your face, causing indentions.

Ana slipped on her flip-flops, and packed up her beach bag. She then lifted you into the air, and smacked you several times to shake the sand off of you. Her slapping caused several more marks to appear on your body, but the marks didn’t help you to look more like yourself. In fact, they made you look even more like a towel.

By this time, both Patty and Kat had had their fun with the beach, and were ready to go home. What happens to your battered, bruised, and beaten blue towel self?
1511.title: Ana's Replacement Towel

15111.content:
Ana handed you back over to Patty who took you with a grin. "Thanks for lending me the towel, it was super soft, i'll borrow it next time" Ana said with a happy chuckle, unaware the super comfy towel was infact her friend. Your sister just grinned "Oh sure, anytime you want. it's a really nice towel" she said as she folded you over her arm and let your face drape down infront of your crotch, not that you could tell what part was where given the pure blue tone of your towel body. The girls chatted as Patty folded you up before stuffing you into her bag, followed by her bikini and lotion bottle, then her own towel, forcing it in ontop of you and pressing down hard. With two towels in her bag she struggled to zip the bag shut but she managed it slowly, pressing more weight down on you and muffling all the sound into a near mute level of incomprehensible faint sounds.

You felt the familiar sense of weightlessness as Patty picked up her bag and slung it over her shoulder, but you couldn't tell much else of what was happening. The rythmic motion of her pedalling as she cycled home however was easy to guess, unfortunatly in the dark warmth of her bag, you couldn't help but be lulled into slumber by the motions as she cycled casually home. When Patty got home she quickly told your mother that you were staying at Kat and Ana's, so she wouldn't wonder about your absence and carried her bag down to the laundry room. Unzipping her bag she tossed her towel and bikini into the washing machine before holding you in one hand, unaware you were asleep and held up her bottle of blue paint with the other, reading the label out loud "Waterproof bonding paint, long lasting, keep off of skin when wet, chance of skin dying, hehe i guess my little towel isnt going to have this come off any time soon, and will be a little blue when she does haha!" she taunted you before tossing you into the washer and turned it on, unaware you had slept through her taunt and wouldn't understand why you wern't reforming as the bonding paint held your shape.

The cold water of the rinse cycle quickly snapped you out of your slumber as your world began to turn, you slapped down onto your sisters bikini and waterlogged towel and realised she had thrown you in the wash with the rest of the beach stuff. Unable to scream for help or yell curses at your sister, all you could do was hold onto your stomach mentally as you span faster and faster, slapping about and being made very clean, but none the less blue. You assumed the wash would get rid of the paint and your mother would pull you out of the washer to safety, however, when Mary came down to collect the washing she saw nothing but a pair of blue towels and a bikini. When you caught sight of a part of yourself as your mother lifted you, you wanted to cry, why were you still blue, what paint had Patty smeared over you?

Unaware she had her daughter in hand, Mary tossed the towels into the dryer to get them nice and dry and fluffy and left you to the baking heat of the dry cycle, you would have melted had it not been for the paint holding your body in shape. When you were collected you silently thanked the gods for the fresh cool air hitting your body, though that thanks quickly faded as your mother folded you up neatly then folded the other towel up ontop of you and carried you both to the airing cupboard with the rest of the household towels. She closed the door and left you in darkness with only the gurgling of the boiler below your shelf to occupy your time. From time to time, one of your family members would either open the door to grab a towel, or it was your mother putting more towels in.

eventually...
15111.title: Ana hands you to Patty, and Patty takes you home.

choices: It's only been a week, and Patty has found you.
It's been several months, and Kat and Ana have found you.
151111.content:
The door of the cabinet swung open, and light once more flooded your vision. As the haze cleared you saw that it was your sister Patty, clear as day. Patty was preoccupied glancing at her phone, and didn’t seem to give you any attention at all. Her hand gripped your body and she pulled you out of the cabinet. Her grip was tight, and you were shoved into her beach bag without a second thought.

A disturbing thought crossed your mind as your body sunk to the bottom of the bag, buried beside Patty’s black two-piece bikini. Patty closed her bag, once more casting you into darkness, and your eyes went mentally wide. It wasn’t possible…was it? Had your sister forgotten what she had done to you? Did she seriously not realize that the towel she had grabbed was you?

Patty would never pass up an opportunity to make fun of you and torture you more in whatever situation you may be in. She wasn’t doing that today. It was possible she was distracted by your phone, and you hoped that was the case, but a part of you doubted it. Patty had forgotten about you, and that spelled disaster, as she was the only person who knew of what had happened to you, and therefore the only person able to rescue you.

Once Patty reached the beach, she changed into her bikini in the locker room. She then walked out to an incredibly sandy area of the beach, and spread you out onto the sand. 155.content:
As Patty biked towards the beach, you quickly realized that there was a hole in her bag! Helpless inside your tiny ball prison, you tried to scream and alert Patty, but it was sadly no use. As Patty turned a sharp corner, you slipped out of her bag. You bounced off of the back wheel of the bike, and bounced away. Patty continued on, totally unaware of her sister’s fate.

You were screaming and crying inside of your ball prison, as your world spun over and over. You wanted to throw up, you wanted to stop spinning, and you just wanted to go back home. Suddenly, you heard a loud rumbling sound, and then a sickening crack. Without warning, the entire weight of a tank crushed you instantly, and you felt yourself spinning and spinning all over again, except even faster!

You had no idea what was going on. You entire world was black, and you were now stuck to some sickening spinning object. Your ball prison had been shattered, but you had no idea where you were now. Every millisecond you were scrapped painfully against sharp bits of gravel, and wet mud splattered against your body. You were too shocked for words, and you were unable to comprehend your situation.

Suddenly, it dawned on you. You realized that you must have gotten run over by a car! That’s why your ball prison had shattered. You had been hit by, and were now stuck to, the tire of a passing car!

Your heart dropped, realizing that you had been run over by a car. You had no idea where this car was going, or when it was going to stop. Everything was an uncertainty, and your life was potentially hanging in the balance. Your world rocked, you began to cry once more, and you soon passed out.

***

When you woke up, the wheels of the car were slowing to a stop. Thankfully, the tire you were stuck to stopped in such a way that you were not crushed against the ground. You heard the sounds of the car being turned off, which was soon followed by doors being opened. You could just make out the voices of people talking from your position.

“Yay!” A young girl’s voice cried. “We’re back home!”

“Finally. That was a long vacation.” Another female voice, this one slightly older, spoke.

“Come on Melissa. It wasn’t that bad.” A third voice spoke, older still. You assumed it was a mom and her two daughters.

“Whatever mom.” Melissa sighed. You heard Melissa shut her door, and walk away.

“I’m always happier at home mom!” The younger girl said.

“Me too Valerie.” The mom replied. “It just doesn’t seem right if we aren’t here at home in Atlanta.” Your heart broke into about a hundred pieces. Atlanta? That was ten hours from where you lived! You would never get home again! Tears flooded your eyes once more, as you saw your old life fading away. Valerie and her mom shut their doors and walked into their house, leaving you all alone outside.

Surprisingly, your fear and sadness slowly turned to determination. You refused to let your life end here, at the unknowing hands of this happy little family. You were determined to get back to your old life, no matter what it took. You began to will your body to reform off of the tire, showing strength and determination you had never demonstrated before. The progress was slow, but you refused to give up.

Time flew for you, but it was actually a full twelve hours until you had popped free from the tire and reformed. Your clothes had been decimated during the ten hour car drive, but you didn’t care that you were naked. You stood in the driveway, staring at the house that belonged to the blissfully unaware family that had almost ruined your life, and you debated your next move.

"Wait a bit dear"
"What happens"
"She is the daughter of Harper"
"Who?"
"Jack Harper, runs a very popular clothing line"
"What do you want me to do?" said the father. "I hang up the phone? I do not care who she is, has no right to enter my house in the middle of the night "
"I know, but you will forgive her"
"Give me a reason"
"Look at her, is alone and scared," she said. "I know the condition of Harper and her daughter suffers too. Surely she came here by accident "
"My father has told you about me?"
"Yes, about you and him," the mother said. "He says it as if it were an amusing anecdote. He even said that sometimes you got lost for days as if it were no big deal "
"That's impossible, no human being is capable of doing something like the nonsense he has"
"I have seen dear"
The father had never believed any of the stories Harper, but relied heavily on his wife to doubt it.
"So tell me how you got here and I want the whole story," he said.
"I came here because of my sister, she locked me inside a toy ball she has. But the ball fell to the street when we went to the beach, it was then that I finished trapped in the tire of your car "
The mother covered her mouth in surprise. The father was embarrassed, as little girl who suffered such abuse of his sister was not good.
"All I want is to go home, I've been through this before, but had never gone this far," he said distressed.
"I'll let you stay here tonight, early tomorrow morning I'll take with your family"
"Thank you thank you very much"
******
You wake up in a bed that did not immediately know and remember what happened yesterday. You wear the clothes of the Valeria‘s doll donate for you. Since neither could see the sink with your height you came down to the kitchen without washing your face.
"Good morning Jillian" you heard the mother say.
"Good morning," you answered.
You looked a chair at home you had a small ladder to climb, but here you would have to make an effort to climb. You were in that when the mother sees you.
"Do you want me to help you?"
"Yes please"
With both hands she picks you up and puts you above the chair, standing but you are unable to see the table.
"Wait a minute, I'll bring some books so you can have breakfast with us," she said. "You should wash your face, these all dirty"
"I can’t reach the sink"
"I'll get those books"
She left you alone in the kitchen. A few minutes passed when you heard footsteps approaching, you thought she was the mother. Actually it was the oldest daughter Melissa moved the chair you use. She seemed willing to sit in the chair, but when she saw you she was startled.
"Sorry, I don’t know you were there," she said and she went to another chair.
You sighed with relief, for a moment you thought would stay again crushed by someone's ass. Experience too often for you.
"I'm back" ad the mother. She put the books on the chair being careful to not crush you with them. You had a pleasant and nice breakfast.
"How is your life Jillian?" asked the father.
How could you answer that? They seemed a nice family so you're sure they pay attention to what you say. You could lie, after all you just met them today and you don’t want to tell strangers your problems. On the other hand you wanted to tell the truth, to say once and for all. How you felt about your life, how you felt that your life was a misery always making sure that someone does not fall on you without warning, how you felt you were nothing more than a toy for others.
1552.title: A shadow in my house

info.brief_description: A teenage girl inherits her father's unfortunate condition.
info.description:
This is an idea by Kentwolf. The story takes place twenty five years after his story, A Squishy Teen ( http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1975029-A-Squishy-Teen ), which, in turn, takes place five years after one of my stories.
By now, Jack and Mary have gotten married and are currently raising two teenage daughters together. While Jack is away most of the time to run his family's specialized clothing factory.

You are 17 year-old Jillian Harper, a small, squishy girl.
You inherited your fathers condition, which means you're quite small for your age and extremely malleable, in addition to looking like an adorable little kid. One thing that's different about you, though, is that you're VERY small (about one foot tall, to be exact). Your parents attributed this to your father's odd DNA. All of this would make you look like a little doll, if you didn't go to such lengths to make yourself look more mature (though, you make sure you stay super cute).
You aren't all that interested in boys, focusing mostly on your school work, wanting to work for your father's clothing company as a fashion designer as soon as possible. Some of your designs are already being used, though you have to give them to other employees, as your dad doesn't want you working for him until you've graduated, meaning that someone else is always taking credit for your work. You don't mind too much, though, since your work is being used anyway.

Marilynn "Mary" Harper
Age: 38
Your mother. She's chosen to stay home and care for you and your sister while your father runs their company. While your grandmother would be overprotective of your dad and keep him coddled and sheltered, your own mom wants you to branch out, interact with other people, and try new things. "If your father stayed by grandma's side, we never would have met", she'd always tell you before scooting you out of the door. She's very outgoing, often hosting various parties at your house several times a month and is often seen with her friends or some of your dad's more trusted employees. She makes it a point to have you do things on your own and tries to help as little as possible. As your dad can attest, she's a bit too trusting at times.

Jack Harper
Age: 39
Your father. Even though he's much bigger than you, he's still dwarfed by your mother and sister and... well, everyone else around him. Because you share a condition, he also looks much younger than he actually is, appearing to be a small boy when he's in casual clothes and. However, he makes it a point to look more mature. Being the head of a clothing company and working late hours, you don't see him all that often. Despite this, you've always had a special connection to him, as he's shared some of his more embarrassing stories to help you feel better. Though you feel rather inspired by where he ended up, owning a very successful clothing line. Maybe you'll follow in his footsteps?

Patricia "Patty" Harper
Age: 17
Your twin sister. While you ended up being small and squishy, your twin sister took after your mom, though she took her jet black hair from your dad while you had your mother's blonde locks. When the two of you were younger, she'd always make you be her dolly when your dad wasn't around, seeing you as nothing but a living toy. Now that you're older, she tries to find other uses for her squishy sister-doll. Tall, athletic, popular, and a body to die for, Patty is everything you wish you could be. Well, almost everything. While she took your mom's looks, she didn't have your father's book smarts like you did. That doesn't bother her, though. She can just squish her whimpy little sister until her homework is done for her. Granted, she doesn't mess with you all the time, just when she's too lazy to do something for herself... or when one of her friends asks her to... or just when she's bored.

Ana and Kat
Age: both 17
The sort-of-twin daughters of your parents' friends, Stacy and Emma. They've been your best friends for as long as you can remember, and have a somewhat decent relationship with your sister. While the two are very close, they both have vastly different personalities.
Kat is rather toned and is extremely athletic, signing up for any sporting event that the school may have going on. She's also the more vocal and outgoing of the two sisters. She's apparently being trained by your dad's cousin (who shares her name) to become a wrestler. She tends to tease both you and her sister pretty often, but she's never actually mean to you.
Ana, meanwhile, is the polar opposite. She's a bit of a nerd, preferring to spend most of her time indoors playing video games, watching anime, or reading old comic books that used to belong to your dad. Because she doesn't go outside as often as her sister, her skin is much more pale and she's a bit chubbier (though certainly not fat). Ana is much more soft-spoken than Kat, sometimes barely speaking above a whisper if at all, and is more careless around you than you'd like to admit. Kat often joked that you were better acquainted with her butt or stomach than her face.

Kara Campbell
Age: 16
A mean girl from school. You've had a problem with Kara ever since Elementary School, when she tried to take the cute squishy dolly home with her. Ever since then, you've known that she was going to be the bane of your existence (and you were right). She's on the top rung of the social ladder at high school and makes sure you don't forget it. She's even gotten you on the cheer squad, which you were psyched about at first... that is, until you found out that you were to represent the rival team during the routines, showing how badly your school was going to squash the competition.

===================================

1) Jillian cannot die, so don't do it.

2) Be sure to use proper grammar and spelling.

3) Make chapters more than one sentence.

4) Limit the choices. After things get to two paths, it's decision time.

5) NO PLAGIARISM. DO NOT COPY SOMEONE ELSE'S WORK AND PASTE IT IN HERE. DO NOT COPY MY STUFF. (you know who you are)

6) (06/08/2015) If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors.

7) (edit: 08/23/15) I'm pretty wishy washy about things involving adult or teenage dudes and gas/toilet stuff, so email me your idea if you plan on adding something along those lines.

Have fun!
